reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2021
reviews.name: Nikki
reviews.title: Brand New Animal Crossing Edition Switch for MSRP
reviews.review: For anyone looking to get an Animal Crossing Edition Switch without paying more than retail price, my advice is to be patient and check back here frequently. At random times, a few consoles will be restocked and available for MSRP (thank you to the other customers in the Q&A who tipped me off about this!). Just a couple minutes after coming across that advice, I refreshed the page to test it out and this is exactly what happened. Originally it said it would take over a month to arrive but I ended up receiving it less than a week later. Just make sure the listing says "Ships from and sold by Amazon.com" to ensure it's not a third party seller and that the price is exactly $299.99.In terms of the product itself, I had already been playing on another Switch for a while and it's a great console (aside from the infamous joycon drift issue). My preferred play style is docked on the TV but it works perfectly on handheld mode as well. The Animal Crossing edition is super cute with its pastel joycons and ACNH-themed dock, I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2020
reviews.name: Nat
reviews.title: Embarassing Scalpers and a Letdown of a Game
reviews.review: It's incredibly disappointing to see nothing but overpriced third party sellers are distributing this product, and the fact that I had to sign up on several stock-tracking websites just to have a chance at owning this console is more than disheartening.To top it all off, the game itself feels like a huge downgrade compared to its predecessor, New Leaf. Not only are several quality-of-life improvements missing, but tons of content such as the Dream Suite, Happy Home Showcases, deep sea diving, and more are absent. Why is island-visiting the only option for multiplayer when multiplayer island tours existed in New Leaf? Surely not because of hardware limitations?Villager dialogue feels empty and simple, devoid of personality aside from their preassigned type. And let's not even start on the One Island Per Switch discourse. Not only was getting ahold of this console an absolute nightmare, but having to pay $60 for a game that feels unfinished is a disgrace. We can only hope that Nintendo has plans to add content (hopefully not behind a paywall) in the future instead of relying on nostalgia to fuel sales.

The driver handed it to me directly, which was wonderful. The colors of JoyCons are two of my favorites and are quite peaceful to look at. The dock is adorable. A refreshing alternative to the standard black. As soon as I took the Switch out of the box I applied a tempered glass screen protector on it.I was also able to transfer user data and save data over from my old Switch to this new one. Something I wasn’t aware I could do, which was a very nice surprise. I really hope they get more of these beautiful consoles in stock soon for the rest of the Animal Crossing fans.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2020
reviews.name: K.M.
reviews.title: Beautiful Switch - Definitely worth the buy if you can find one
reviews.review: Definitely love how bright the colors are on this switch, more of a neon pastel shade. The switch is the V2, which has extended battery life and a more efficient CPU. Comparing this switch the the V1, the IPS panel has a warmer tint whereas the V1 is much brighter. Though color values do vary across switches. The joycons themselves are more of a matte finish on the coating rather than the glossy feel on previous joycons. The colors match well with the dock and will definitely stand out by your TV. The dock itself is a bit wider compared to the V1 allowing more wiggle room to prevent the switch from being scratched, though I do recommend purchasing a glass screen protector. The pattern on the back of the switch definitely gives it an "animal crossing" feel to showcasing. They did a really good job in making the pattern stand out compared to previous special edition switches.Overall, pretty happy with having a new switch that stands out and has a longer battery life. Will definitely be a well-used switch in the coming months.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2020
reviews.name: Sydney W.
reviews.title: It’s pretty but not sturdy.
reviews.review: This is my first switch console. So let me start off by saying the console itself is absolutely beautiful. The design on the back is so pretty and the joycons are gorgeous as well.My biggest issue is not the console itself. But the accessories for it. I’m sure you’ve seen the terrible reviews for the joycons themselves. If you haven’t please check them out. I had done my research on them before hand and ended up buying a different controller just because I was so nervous about using the joycons. The idea is awesome. But they feel so flimsy and cheap. I hadn’t planned to even use the ones that came with the console. I planned to put them away as collectors items. But of course I had to use them to start up the console. As I was holding them I felt the plastic on the back of the right joycon move and make a loud snap. I thought I broke it and I hadn’t even done anything. I was just setting up the console. The colors may look great. But after having that as my first experience I do believe all the reviews I’ve seen for them.The next thing that feels awful is the dock. I had planned to play with the console docked the majority of the time. But just putting the console in makes me cringe because no matter how gentle or slow you are it still hits the sides of the dock when attempt to dock it. There’s only two tiny pieces of soft rubber like material in the dock itself. Which doesn’t protect the console enough. So I ended up buying a screen protector immediately just to give some protection from the dock itself. Just pushing the power button makes the console move and jiggle around in the dock, making it repeatedly hit hard plastic. It doesn’t feel secure whatsoever. The actual part that connects to the switch inside of the dock is very lose as well. The door on the back of the dock also feels cheap. Reminds me of the doors on the Wii. It feels like it could pop off rather easily.Let’s move on to the console a little bit. I have used the kickstand. It doesn’t feel super stable and I’d worry if I didn’t have it standing up on a very stable surface. I’d be nervous to have it anywhere near children or accident prone people like me while using it. The screen looks great though. But the hdmi quality of the console menu looks horrible on my monitor. Games seem to look great though, just not the menu/home/settings etc. So I’m not sure if there’s a way to fix that or not. I play other consoles on my monitor and they look beautiful. Another thing, while holding the console with the joycons attached it feels huge. Too big, awkward, and heavy for my tiny hands and I wasn’t even holding it that long. So if you are thinking about getting the switch to playing more mobile and you have tiny hands, maybe consider a switch lite? Unless you want docking and kick stand capabilities which isn’t something the lite can do.The console works great. It’s fast and easy to use and navigate. The buttons feel sturdy as well. I’ve been playing Animal Crossing for hours while docked and the console never gets hot. Just a little warm.Overall this console was a cool idea. Just wish they would have put a little more time and money into making some parts a little more sturdy.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2021
reviews.name: Kimberly Dvorak
reviews.title: Brand new Nintendo Switch won’t power on only used a dozen times
reviews.review: The media could not be loaded. Loved the product initially as it was a Christmas gift.The design (Animal Crossings) was cute, my favorite colors.I’ve only played it a dozen or so times.Owned by an adult (well taken care of).Three months after purchasing it will NOT turn on.I’ve replaced the power cord hoping that was why it wouldn’t charge.Tried charging it on the cradle as well as directly plugged into the charging cord.No success with either.The unit will not power on.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2020
reviews.name: Chloe
reviews.title: Won my sisters heart!
reviews.review: Alright so since the Covid-19 outbreak has officially ruined my sisters senior year she had started getting into animal crossing. After playing on the I Phone app for what felt like forever she decided she wanted to transition to a game on the 3ds console. Since she had started playing animal crossing new leaf she fell in love with the series. So as her big sister I had decided I would get her this limited edition themed switch in hopes of helping with her depression as well as to cheer her up for her senior year being ruined. Also so she could get a taste of Animal Crossing new horizons for when it comes out March 20th, 2020!The day I told her I purchased it she hopped with joy. I was excited too considering I was sharing my own excitement for animal crossing with my sister. It had finally arrived. Its box didn't come in damaged and the console was packed safely to prevent possible damages. It works perfectly as any nintendo switch should with no defects at all in the console itself. The only concerns I have to remind future buyers is that the joycons will stop working properly after a year of use. This is coming from my own nintendo switch experiences and other fellow switch owners where the controls will drift randomly while you're trying to play a game after a year after consistant use. So I'd be best to invest in a second set of controllers just in case.All I have left to say is that this was indeed worth my money and my sister couldn't be happier with her early senior graduation gift!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2020
reviews.name: GoldenBunny90
reviews.title: BEST B-DAY PRESENT EVER !!!
reviews.review: We bought this for my 7-year-old son's birthday & he couldn't be happier!! This is by far the most adorable Nintendo switch console out there!! I definitely recommend purchasing it.We bought it when it was $300 plus tax. I do not recommend paying any more than that price.. just wait till it gets back in stock & buy it for $300. Do not purchase it from greedy scalpers.. keep an eye out because as soon as it gets in stock it sells out usually the same day! We are so fortunate we were able to get one in time for my son's birthday ..we purchased this back in October & held on to it till December for his birthday. If you want one for Christmas, I doubt you will be able to get one at the $300 price ..unfortunately it's sold out till mid January.. but if you can I say go ahead & get it! This thing is adorable & really is a great collector item for any Nintendo fan! Even if they aren't into animal crossing. It is a very unisex design. I believe it can be for a boy or a girl. 👍

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2020
reviews.name: brown
reviews.title: This console is NOT a NORTH AMERICA console
reviews.review: Seller deliberately did not state that the console was for sale and use in either Korea/Phillipines/Dubia as it turned out after calling Nintendo and giving them the ups code the one I received was meant for the Phillipines. I called the seller Wacky Jacky and told them what was written on the bottom of the box, he then told me to please wait a minute while he got another from his warehouse and proceeded to verify what I said then said he was sorry and that he had no idea and that his distributor assured him it was a US (North America) console. He then said I feel really bad and was going to send me a $100 gift card but what he did was refund $100 of the purchase price thinking that I would then keep the system. I don't know why he thought I would keep the system when I already had my return authorization label printed out and told him I was returning it, never did I say I wanted to keep the system. Am I supposed to believe he didn't know it wasn't a North America console when even now he has edited his listing to let any future buyers know that what he's selling isn't intended to be sold in the US. The seller asked me to please edit my review and rating but I see no reason to change the stars although I did edit this review to include the conversation with him and the fact that he did not add a note to his product description to make buyers aware of the consoles region. BEWARE WHEN YOU ARE BUYING A SYSTEM THAT IT MAY NOT BE INTENDED FOR SALE IN THE US..... CONTACT THE SELLER BEFORE BUYING AND HAVE THEM VERIFY WHAT IS WRITTEN ON THE BOTTOM OF THE BOX

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2020
reviews.name: Anna L.
reviews.title: Such a cute switch! I love it!
reviews.review: I couldn't believe my luck when I was able to snag one at MSRP after the release date. It's so cute! I like the design of this one much better than the other switches, and the dock is adorable, especially if you're an Animal Crossing fan. And it's the newer version with improved battery life, too! I was thinking about getting a switch for a while, but the lack of games I absolutely had to have and the colors (I'm not a big fan of the standard colors/designs) put me off. Animal Crossing solved both of these problems with ACNH and this amazing special edition.My only complaint (other than how difficult it was to get - finally caught a restock in the middle of the night and even that sold out in less than 5 minutes) is that sometimes one of the joycons gets stuck when trying to remove it from the strap. It's probably just an issue with mine in particular, but it does make it kind of annoying to remove. I have to put some force into it, and I'm sure that one of these days, I'll accidentally scratch myself trying to remove it. Otherwise, it's very cute, and at MSRP, I'd definitely choose it over the other colors!PS - I hear that this version is restocking, at least in Japan, so absolutely do not buy from scalpers! When I was hunting for this, there were at least 100 being sold by scalpers for ~$500;now there are just over 20 for $750 each. It's cute, but it's not worth making a scalper $400+ off of other people's desperation. Just wait for a restock, or buy a regular switch and put a skin over it.

reviews.title: Awesome and Beautiful Nintendo Switch console
reviews.review: It's good thing that was able to get Nintendo Switch for $299.99 few weeks ago and it arrived this week. Beautiful Nintendo Switch- Animal Crossing: New Horizon Special Edition console.It looks awesome with colors and design, and it works excellent at my home. I like that they have few free to play games and that they have SNES and NES games from Nintendo E-Shop. I can't wait to get Animal Crossing game someday. Hope they Add more free-to-play games on Nintendo Switch, add Twitch streaming app, and more apps for gamers, and be able to use bluetooth devices and console controllers with bluetooth.Hope they make more awesome and beautiful special editions designs and art Nintendo Switch consoles in the future and with 4k/8k graphics, audio, and UHD quality.Overall awesome console to own and have with my other different home consoles to play with my family and myself.

reviews.title: Great console, if you can get it for regular price
reviews.review: Got this to replace a Switch that was in for repairs because I missed Animal Crossing too much and I couldn't resist the special edition being available at regular price!I've only used it for a day so far but I've had a few issues with the joycons disconnecting randomly. No more than a mild annoyance so far but not an issue I had with my old Switch even after a year of near-daily play.Happy to see Switches being available for $300 again after 8 months of quarantine price gouging. As much as I love my Switch I wouldn't pay the $400+ some jerks have been asking while they're in low supply.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2021
reviews.name: AmazonCustomer
reviews.title: Not Impressed
reviews.review: I expected a bit more when it came to the Switch and I was a bit let down. First of all, I feel like the design is counter-intuitive especially the docking system. I don't understand why you need to place the entire tablet in-between such a cramped space where you could accidentally scratch up the device. There are so many bells and whistles that snap on and off it becomes rather annoying just to play a simple game. You can scratch up the joycons just by sliding them into the joycon grips. Why did you design it that way? The kickstand on the back of the Switch is a joke. It's so hard to open and isn't long enough to support the device. Also since, the power cord plug is directly under the device, you can't plug it in when you're using the kickstand. So many design irregularities and inconveniences. Fifty million buttons all over the place, which means fifty million ways to play one game and hold the controllers. It's so chaotic and annoying. Fun features such a streetpass and an internet browser are not on this device. This device still isn't powerful enough to compete with Playstation or Xbox. Just playing this device in your hand is a struggle because it is so freaking huge and weighty. I wouldn't buy this for a child, they can stick with the 3ds. To be honest, I had more fun playing on my 3ds and vita than the Switch.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2022
reviews.name: Milky Quartz
reviews.title: BEST NINTENDO CONSOLE!
reviews.review: I've always loved Nintendo and every console that they've made but this one, really makes it to the top of my list! It's portable, light-weight and, pretty thin. Also, Amazon has a ton of cute cases to choose from so that you can bring your console for when you're on-the-go. The buttons feel comfortable to the slightest touch, everything feels smooth. Even the joysticks and trigger buttons have no resistance so there's no need to press them too hard. Easy to set up, there's a shop on the main menu for you to purchase games straight from your console and you can find people online to play with for your favorite Nintendo Switch games. I seriously love my Nintendo Switch and, everyone should get one today!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2020

reviews.title: Product is great! Resellers... not so much!
reviews.review: TLDR: Product is SO CUTE!! BUT doesn’t do anything special compared to a regular Switch (other than give 10/10 on aesthetic) so don’t buy unless you can afford it/the look it worth it to you.Long review:This product is amazing!! The pastel colors are so cute and the texture on the back adds a great extra touch. The dock has an AC graphic on it which was a great addition tomy living room! The packaging is also well thought out leading to a great unboxing experience. Of course this works exactly like every other Nintendo switch, so this is entirely about aesthetic.With all of that said, the price gouging on this product is insane. Because it is a limited edition the reselling price is crazy, and because it does nothing a normal Switch can’t do, so purchasing this is a novelty. If you have the cash to drop go for it (I was lucky enough to get one at the normal price). But as I was hunting one down when they were first announced, I watched people buy them up and list them at inflated prices before it even came out. So maybe consider if you want to give those people your money.

reviews.review: I LOVE IT.It is exactly the same as any other switch but because I love animal crossing I had to get this one.Everything works,and I'm happy I found this special edition still in stock. A must for any animal crossing fan!I do wish it would have come with a copy of the game. But I'm happy I bought either way!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2020
reviews.name: Brian Critch
reviews.title: Wait for the restock dont buy their product.
reviews.review: I do believe its coincidence but, you're trying to make a profit from a scarcity during a pandemic. Isnt that illegal?

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2021
reviews.name: SC
reviews.title: The cutest!
reviews.review: Needless to say, the Nintendo Switch is so much fun and a great way to kill time.But on top of that, this particular console's Animal Crossing theme is just the cutest I've ever seen.I never liked the primary-looking colors of the OG console, so the soft blue and mint green joy con colors really appealed to me.The back of the switch itself has rivers and islands etched onto it as well!It's the little details that really make a difference for me.The dock is a light cream color with the raccoon travel agents on the bottom right.I'm so glad this set was available again because, although I'm sure I'd be happy with the OG console, I'm so much happier with my Animal Crossing edition.It makes me smile every time I see it.I've never even played the game before I bought it, but it ended up being my first game purchase and it makes me even more happy that I bought this edition.I love it!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2021
reviews.name: Randy M
reviews.title: Wait for new model in Oct 2021
reviews.review: JULY 9: So far so good. Was well packaged and I got it in two days. Bought as a replacement for Gen 1 console for the extended battery. My advice for anyone reading this though : wait until October - there is an even newer model releasing. Wish I'd known at the time of purchaseEDIT: AUG 17 : About two weeks ago, it randomly said the SD card had an error and it force restarted. I didn't think anything of it since my original Switch did it once years ago and never again. Well, a few days ago this one did it again.... Now I was starting to worry. Today, just over a month later - it can't read SD cards anymore. So, I'm stuck with the native 32gb and lost all my games. Maybe I just got a bad one, but my old Switch never gave me a single problem and I regret replacing it now. Just outside the return window this thing decides to stop working.EDIT : SEPT 1 : Had to send it in to Nintendo because it had been over 30 days and I couldn't return it to Amazon. . . Nintendo erased 3000 hours of data and then replaced the system. Nintendo told me I needed to return it to the merchant for a refund, but because they replaced it, the serial number no longer matches. So, I'm stuck with a faulty system and all my game saves deleted. Worst purchase ever.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2020
reviews.name: theogjb
reviews.title: 10/10 Recommend
reviews.review: This is my third switch so that I can have three Animal Crossing islands because I’m insane, also I have severe ocd - same thing I guess?, and I am absolutely in love with the AC theme. I have a different style/color for each one so I can tell the islands apart but this one is def my fave. The Switch is my console. I have played a couple of games on ps4 (Atelier games that weren’t out on Switch until more recently), but now that those games are on Switch I will get them as soon as they go on sale. I love the handheld option because I can play while my husband watches something on our tv, and I love that it can also be docked so I can see things on the big screen. I play mostly handheld. It plays smoothly with the joycons and a pro controller. You can even play with a pro controller when it’s not docked if you don’t want to/can’t use the joycons. I’m sorry about the novella. It’s just enjoyable and I recommend it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2022
reviews.name: Traci
reviews.title: Great console but problem with controller
reviews.review: The console worked great.I didn't have any problems playing the games.However, the controller had an issue.It would only work for an hour or so and then would say, "problem connecting."Of course this meant I wasn't able to use the controllers.I actually purchased two pro-controllers that worked great with the game.Amazon connected me to Nintendo service team and they tried to help me reset the controller but that didn't work. They said that I needed to send back the game so that they could try to repair it and if that didn't work they would need to send me another game.I just returned this and got the Nintendo switch blue/red console instead. That one works perfectly without any issues so far.So although I love the Nintendo Switch I am not a fan of the animal crossing version which is why I am rating a 3. The nintendo switch red/blue version will get my 5 star review.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2021
reviews.name: Grimz
reviews.title: This switch saved my marriage.. for now.
reviews.review: This is my second purchase of a Nintendo Switch Animal Crossing edition. I was bummed out when my wife took my switch hostage claiming it for herself to play Animal Crossing, especially since Monster Hunter Rise had just come out. I was even more bummed out because I had missed out on buying the MHR switch edition because my rationale mind decided I didn’t need a second switch. I was left with 2 options, leave my wife & fight for custody of the switch or purchase another during the shortage brought by on by the epidemic. Surprisingly after a few months of contemplating my decision the switch prices went back down to an affordable price. It still wasn’t easy finding a switch in stores so I took to the internet where I was surprised to see a brand new switch going for regular price. I quickly added the item to my cart & purchased right away! It was delivered with upmost care like a stork bringing me a new baby. Everything was brand new, I was taken back to a simpler time in my life, opening presents on Christmas day. Finally after a quick software update I could play MHR months after its release! Little to my surprise my wife quit playing Animal Crossing shortly after I got my new switch because she went down Korean Drama rabbit hole on Netflix..

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2020
reviews.name: Juan
reviews.title: Just the perfect gift
reviews.review: My daughter ask if she could have the Nintendo Switch, so i log on to amazon to look for one and when my daughtersaw that they were selling the Animal Crossing Edition she asked me if she could please have that one. I was more than please to buy the animal crossingEdition because it was only at $299.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2020
reviews.name: RJC
reviews.title: Nintendo Switch #2
reviews.review: Here is what happened. I already had a Nintendo Switch but I didn’t play with it for a few months so when I wanted to use it it had no power. I put it on the dock to charge and nothing. I thought it was dead forever so I ordered a new one from Amazon. Later I went to see if my old Nintendo would power up after I charged it. What I was not doing is pushing in the power button enough, after I pushed the Nintendo powered up. So now I own 2 Nintendo’s. It’s great to have 2. This new NS works great just like the old one. I could care the less about the game Animal Crossing but I like how the NS looks. Also there was waiting time if I wanted the exact one I have. Over all the NS is great! In fact I like it better then Sony play Station or X-box I don’t even play them anymore. I love it I can play the old games from Nintendo and others. The first game I played was PONG back in the day. Nintendo Rocks!!!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2020
reviews.name: Schorl
reviews.title: Animal Crossing Switch is great! So cute!
reviews.review: The Animal Crossing Switch is just beautiful. I love the colors and the details in the design. The system I received works great and was as described. I actually received it a day ahead of schedule, which is amazing for this time if year (close to Christmas).Right now, due to Covid, most sellers are raising prices on these systems. Especially with these special edition ones. Most other listings for the Animal Crossing Switch have been almost double the normal price, so I’m really grateful to have gotten one from this seller for the standard retail price. This made my Christmas.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2021
reviews.name: IfOnlyICouldReadAllDay
reviews.title: My son likes it
reviews.review: My nine-year-old son saved and worked in order to buy a Nintendo Switch. He bought it with his own money and I couldn't be prouder of him. We bought the Animal Crossing edition only because it would have been available earlier than the standard version. He said he didn't care how it looked as long as it could play Switch games. Originally, Amazon delivered a completely unrelated package and said it was the Switch, but their customer service sent the replacement as soon as the issue was reported. Kudos to Amazon for that. My son has only used it in handheld mode since there isn't a TV available for his use. He has never placed it in the dock so I don't know how that would work. We've had it for a couple of weeks at this point. Here is my son's review:I like it. It's been good so far. Its most impressive feature is the battery life. One charge can last for six hours of continuous gameplay. It also charges more quickly than any other device I've ever had. It goes from around 4% to 25% in 10 to 15 minutes. I'm happy I bought it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2021
reviews.name: Stefan Berger
reviews.title: Love the ACNH switch
reviews.review: Call me crazy.....I bought the original switch a while ago and never played Animal Crossing before. When everyone was talking about New Horizon during the start of the Pandemic, I thought to give it a shot. Boy, I should not have done it :) I started spending all my free time paying off my loans to Tom Nook, hunting for villagers and trying to decorate my Island. Like many, I got kinda bored after everything was unlocked and got tired of the Villagers repeating the same over and over again. I thought of resetting my Island, but didn't want to lose everything I had worked for so hard. Then Nintendo announce to release the ACNH special edition switch again and beside I didn't like the idea of buying another switch, it was a great opportunity to start another Island with an ACNH themed switch. Anyway, I didn't regret spending another $299 - the switch is VERY cute and fits perfectly on my shelf. Beside still having my old switch with a developed, but basically abandonedIsland I mostly play on the new ACNH switch now. I know it's very hard to reset your Island, but if you don't have the money to buy another system, you may want to consider it. Starting from scratch actuallydoes bring a lot of the lost magic back.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2021
reviews.name: Dru Rodriguez
reviews.title: Nice customer service
reviews.review: I've had the light for a while, but it started drifting and playing animal crossing with a drift is no fun at all. Especially when u can't switch out the joycons I also wanted to start my island over so it was about time to get a new switch. As I was looking I was so lucky to see the animal crossing special edition back in stock and not at a scalping price. But at the normal price of 299.99, but when the first package was delivered it got stolen because Amazon delivery didn't know, customer service at first had an aditude with me. I had assume they didn't believe me that it was stolen. But it was and at the end of the day. Im so grateful they were able to replace the console with out Me having to get my money back because I saw that the price instantly jump from 299.99 to 360.00 which I would never recomend buying it at that price.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2022
reviews.name: Kelly l
reviews.title: Go for xbox
reviews.review: I like the switch but honestly the controller set up is foreign and my 90s brain can’t easily play with kids. Bought a controller for retro brains and it makes for a better experience and ease of use. Games are Pretty expensive. We bought the online subscription as well as the expansion pack and quite frankly I’m not terribly impressed Xbox was a much better set up online. No surprisingly when I signed up for my switch subscription it told me I already had a profile because of my Xbox subscription. Huh? Ya don’t say. Anyway it’s all connected and now we are too kids love it. Grab yourself an external memory card make sure to bring for a good one because you will get a lot of downloadable games for free with your subscription you just need to be able to download them.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2020
reviews.name: Jennifer Noir
reviews.title: Love It!
reviews.review: This is the most beautiful Nintendo Switch Console I ever have, and probably ever will, seen. It's so smooth and relaxing to just look at. Worth the money as long as it's not bought from a scalper!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2020
reviews.name: Excalibur
reviews.title: Very beautiful, i almost shed a tear.
reviews.review: Okay so this is going to be a review with my overall experience. Yes, it was overpriced, I think this was worth it, I personally got it for the Joy-cons, and I don't regret it, because you really don't know when you will get the opportunity to get one for less. Anyways, arrived in perfect condition, first switch ever, the only thing that was wrong is the Left Bumper on the Joy-con, which i don't know how to explain it but kind of loose, more than the Right Bumper. It bothers me because of something on the inside, and also since I paid a lot for this switch but not enough to complain, its just something i'll have to live with. But besides that, it was a great experience, the bumper was the only thing that gave me a fright since it feels very weird. Now I don't have anything to play since my game doesn't arrive until Wednesday, but just downloading free games is fun, but originally there is only 25gb so I would recommend getting a micro SD, but i think that's all.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2020
reviews.name: CBeatty
reviews.title: LOVE IT!! Worth the wait to buy it for original Nintendo price
reviews.review: Love my new Nintendo Switch Animal Crossing version. I have been waiting for over a year for this. I originally ordered the regular version but it never came so I went to reorder and found that this was finally available. So glad I finally got it. After a year I would have taken anything...my luck - this one was available. So easy to set up. So easy to use. So very happy with the Amazon customer service and the Nintendo Switch. Don’t buy from scalpers who buy cheap and jack up the price. Just wait patiently. Worth the wait.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2020
reviews.name: J
reviews.title: Fast shipping, cute edition
reviews.review: Got in today after two days from purchasing even though it said delivery would take longer! Pleasantly surprised. It’s much cuter in person than I expected. Glad I just waited patiently for the Switch is be back in stock than pay those high prices scalpers were selling them for. Thank you Amazon!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2020
reviews.name: Charlene Pockette
reviews.title: No Game included
reviews.review: Please don't think bundle means animal crossing game is with it because its not!!!!I feel mislead.. now I see where it says game not included but like many when it says Animal Crossing Bundle u just assume because of the price u get the game to!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2020
reviews.name: Alice K.
reviews.title: I love it
reviews.review: I originally bought a Nintendo switch lite because this console was sold out everywhere and I desperately wanted to play Animal Crossing during this pandemic. I would literally check every month (since April) to see if maybe a store had this in stock, but sadly at the time, it was only third-party sellers selling at a huge markup price.By October, I decided to check one last time hoping that someone was selling at a decent price and to my surprise Amazon and several other retailers had this back in stock! Bought it right away because from my understanding this was supposed to be a limited edition item and didn’t want to miss the opportunity to own it.Got it in no time and I love it. It’s such a pretty color. It came around a good time since a lot of Switch games have gone on sale for the holiday. I still solely use my switch lite for Animal Crossing, but use my new switch for all other games.No regret purchasing it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2021
reviews.name: Susanna Medrano
reviews.title: Tons of games to choose from
reviews.review: Great system.My son owns one but has it with him at college so I decided to get one for myself and I must say it's got such a huge selection of games.I still have my 3ds but didn't realize how much Nintendo had expanded on game selection and variety. I'm a huge animal crossing fan so I bought this version of Switch since I played the first one on the 3ds.Their online eshop, accessible through an online connection, has an almost endless selection of games.You can buy physical copies or digital copies of games and some are digital only through the eshop.As a longtime gamer (I own a PS4 and original owner of a regular NES I bought in 1989), I can honestly say this is Nintendo's best system since you can play it on your TV but also take it with you (portable) like a 3ds.You can also play games on it offline so you don't have to always be connected to the internet.This is a console that is great for all ages of people, young or old and when I'm tired of hack and slash on my PS4, the Switch has many chill titles of games to relax with.I'm 52 and enjoy mySwitch a lot.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2021
reviews.name: Craig Campbell
reviews.title: Beautiful Special Edition!
reviews.review: I got to admit, I was a little ticked off at Nintendo that the day this switch arrived at my doorstep, they announced the OLED Switch.That being said I am VERY happy with this purchase!This console is beautiful and is a very nice upgrade to my launch day Switch that died last month.Throw on a couple of pretty cases to help protect this and you have an amazing set up on your hands.Nintendo has always made high quality consoles and special editions like this Animal Crossing Switch help showcase that very well.Now even though the OLED was announced as well, it looks like the same specs just with a better screen.Very nice for those who prefer handheld mode.I use mine in the dock most of the time so I didn't really need that.TLDR: If you want a really nice Special Edition Switch then don't be dismayed by the OLED announcement.... the Animal Crossing console is very nice and well worth the money. 👌

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2020
reviews.name: Amy Nguyen
reviews.title: Missing Products
reviews.review: The price was already heavily inflated. I was more than willing to pay. But how are you going to make me pay 700$ and not include everything? I was excited only to see the straps were missing. If i paid 700, i would want everything included.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2022
reviews.name: Choi Sam-Won
reviews.title: Love the animal crossing design and the pastel colors for the joycons!
reviews.review: If you're an Animal Crossing fan, then you'd enjoy adding this to your repertoire of consoles and games. I bought this last year and gave it away to one of my family members, but then I ended up missing it and decided I wanted it back, so I went and bought myself another one. I guess someone else must have really liked it too because unfortunately it was stolen after a few months of having it; now I have a 3rd Animal Crossing Switch console, and I love it so much. Definitely spend a good amount of time playing Animal Crossing New Horizons, Mario Kart 8, Fire Emblem Three Houses, Final Fantasy X/X-2 Remastered, etc. 110% Recommend

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2021
reviews.name: Roddy
reviews.title: Superb
reviews.review: The animal crossing edition is absolutely beautiful. It DOES NOT come with the game, just FYI to those who are looking to get this edition. I already had the game since I originally played on a switch lite. However, I think if you are an animal crossing fan this is fantastic in every way possible. I am so happy with my purchase. It only took 3 days to receive the switch even though it originally was 5-6 weeks estimated delivery. Please don't pay more than $299.99 for this console. Have patience and it will be available, check often and you will get one.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2022
reviews.name: GiGi
reviews.title: Super cute!
reviews.review: If it had just come with the game, I would have given it 5 stars. I wouldn't even mind paying extra for it, if they'd offered a bundle.Tip: You get a bonus item in Animal Crossing, if you play it on this edition of the Switch!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2020
reviews.name: TaylorCat
reviews.title: This AC switch is very cute but maybe get a micro SD card too...
reviews.review: I love the aesthetics of the console and I appreciate that I was able to buy it at regular retail price but the storage space is terrible. I ended up buying a micro SD card because of how bad the storage space on the switches. Like so bad I was only able to store maybe five to six games before I got the SD card. That's not terrible if you're just the kind of person to play one or two games on the switch but definitely something to think about.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2020
reviews.name: Norberto
reviews.title: Bought the Animal Crossing because I asumed it came with the game and it didn't
reviews.review: I bought this nintendo for my doughter, christmass 2020, Once opened and made all the setup, she asks me where is the game, and I say, well look in the box it has to be somewhere. Well NO GAME INCLUDED, that is what the box says, so what am I buying the Animal Crossing edition for? To have some animals printed on the console base? THAT IS PLAIN DUMB. This is a way to fraud the buyer in getting a console asuming that it comes with a certain game installed because of the name and it doesn't. So I had to buy the game in the eStore as was obvious I couldn't give a gift of an Animal Crossing Console with no game of it inside... I feel scammed. Would love to return it to Nintendo but it's a christmass gift and I can't ... next time they won't get me fooled.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2021
reviews.name: Yoon Sung Joon
reviews.title: Bad Luck...IDK...Was not really a Nintendo owner till I had Kids.
reviews.review: This is our 2nd Switch in 1 year and a half...This one only lasted 30 days before the Switch told my son to shut down and restart the Console...He did...NEVER TURNED BACK ON?!Still under warranty but WTF NINTENDO!!! This thing costs $300.00!? It's like I rented it from NINTENDO for $10.00/day and am left with nothing (Till I go through the return and replace process.)

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2020
reviews.name: MMayhem
reviews.title: Beautiful Nintendo Switch!!
reviews.review: I'm quite pleased with my brand new Switch! I specifically got it because I am a fan of Animal Crossing and was happy I got to snag one on Amazon before they sold out. It works like a normal Switch and I actually sold my old one just to get this beauty. ^_^This Switch is a SPECIAL EDITION and I hope they release more for the people that actually want it! PLEASE AVOID RESELLERS!!!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2020
reviews.name: matthew palermo
reviews.title: Doesn't stand behind what they ship out
reviews.review: Honestly as much as my wife loves this thing its not worth it. Ours came with the game code and it doesn't work and the seller won't work with you even after showing the proof. The code does not work. Yes it says game doesn't come with but the one they sent does....that tells me they bought in bulk without knowing what they bought then maked it up...karma is a b****.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2021
reviews.name: John Holiman
reviews.title: False Advertising
reviews.review: The title ofthe Nintendo Switch is "Animal Crossing" and one would assume that the game is on the Switch.NO IT'S NOT! You have to spend an additional $70.00 to get the actual game. I gave it one star and it should be no star for lying about what the product contained.This was a gift and it was extremelyembarrassing to find out that the product was not what it appears to be. Amazon needs to have Nintendo correct the false advertising and it should be reported to the Consumer Product Council. Users should at lest be reimburse for the fame purchase. Shame on Nintendo!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2021
reviews.name: Kena
reviews.title: It's everything I could've ever dreamed of and more.
reviews.review: I had experience with the Switch since my family had a shared one for a while, but sometimes you get tired of passing the console around so I got one of my own! I'm so glad I was able to get the New Horizons one because it's so much cuter in person and as an avid Animal Crossing fan since the 2001 Gamecube release here in the west, it's just so good. It took a while since this design is so popular but when I finally caught it during a restock period I knew I had to grab it!I love the color scheme, and seeing Tom Nook with Timmy and Tommy on a lil' island is so precious <3 The all around aesthetic makes it feel like both a console and an artpiece dedicated to your new journey on a deserted island.If you're a big AC fan who can afford to get it and you're able to grab one when they're in stock, I'd say to go for it. Nintendo most certainly knew what they were doing when they made this design because I had wanted this Switch since day one.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2020
reviews.name: Jorge Topete
reviews.title: Switch was not in the box
reviews.review: The media could not be loaded. What the hell?! Everything was in the bix except the switch and the joy cons😡. As you can see in the video, that was the state of the box, even the amazon box was kind of open but definetly was not expecting this. I hope I get am answer.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2022
reviews.name: Dee Quinones
reviews.title: Best price I could find
reviews.review: Brand new, pretty/unique colors, and best price I could find. This was out of stock both online and in stores at big box stores, and the places that I could find it, the price was $100 more expensive than it was here.You can NOT beat $299 at this point! I love my switch!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2020
reviews.name: Rachael
reviews.title: Love My Animal Crossing Switch
reviews.review: Glad I was able to get this edition of the Nintendo Switch. I wanted to purchase the Animal Crossing Switch earlier in 2020 when it first came out, but it was quickly out of stock. My order arrived in a timely manner and in great condition. I only have 32 GB of memory, but I haven't come across any memory issues yet while playing a few games. I like that this console not only has a cute design and fun colors, but it came in a neat Animal Crossing cardboard box with every item needed for operation neatly organized. I had to buy or download my games separately from this purchase. This does not include the Animal Crossing: New Horizons game as part of the package.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2020
reviews.name: Wynter Lee
reviews.title: Didn't Know It Was A Rip Off
reviews.review: Honestly, I'm glad I have a switch but didn't realize the new switch was still only getting sold for the same amount as $300. I honestly didn't know I was getting ripped off until everyone told me I was. While the design and colors are super cute I'm really sad they jacked the price up and I had no idea.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2021
reviews.name: Jessica
reviews.title: Game system missing parts!Disappointed!
reviews.review: I purchased the Nintendo switch gaming system back in September as a Christmas gift. I never opened it and had it in a suitcase for a couple of months. My daughter opened it on Christmas morning and the system was missing a side panel and not functioning.It was very disappointing! We purchased a system that obviously did not go through any sort of inspection to make sure that it was a functioning product.We are working with Nintendo now and having to send it off for repairs which will take approximately three weeks.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2021
reviews.name: john michael kyser
reviews.title: Don't get duped, the games not included
reviews.review: Thank you for ruining a little girls birthday... fantastic marketing strategy that has alienated a long time consumer. Zero reason to call this an Animal Crossing edition unless you want people to think the game is included. Yup at bottom of page last bullet it says game not included but why wasn't that listed first in the description, easy, cause you hope people won't see that. Last time I will attempt to make this large and type of purchase through Amazon, if I'd been in a brick and mortar I would have been able to talk it through and the clever marketing wouldn't have fooled me.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2021
reviews.name: Olivia Ross
reviews.title: AC Fans - this ones for you
reviews.review: Personally, these joycons are two of my favorite colors. So that’s already amazing. Second, if you’re a big AC fan, this Switch theme is so much more meaningful. Okay, and it’s the same price as the regular switch (well, when you’re able to buy it from a reputable company and not with price gouging). It comes with everything you need - the device, two joycons, charger, dock, and I really want to say mine came with the hdmi cord? I got it about six months ago and have a ton of hdmi cords so I don’t quite remember. It does NOT come with acnh, which is awesome if you previously shared a device.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2022
reviews.name: BeebeStudios
reviews.title: Was expecting a new item
reviews.review: Came in damaged box. Right joycon is very loose, too loose for being played a couple hours. Some of the items in the box didn’t have the plastic , like the right joycon, so I know it’s been played before. I expect new when I’m paying new prices. Very disappointed.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2020
reviews.name: IAN
reviews.title: LOVE IT!
reviews.review: Got this for my gf & she loves it! She has been wanting the Animal Crossing edition since it came out the first time & it sold out so fast! So when we saw it on Amazon, we knew we had to jump on it. So glad we were able to get it finally. She loves the pastel joy cons & the design on the back. The dock is even cuter in person.It was packaged nicely & delivered right on time! Everything that was advertised was in the box & individually wrapped. There weren’t any issues upon opening. The system runs very smoothly! My gf hasn’t had any issues while playing & she’s been playing it almost every day for about 2 months now.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2021
reviews.name: Christina
reviews.title: JUST IN TIME 4 CHRISTMAS
reviews.review: I have to say after reading all the mixed and bad reviews I was very nervous to order this is especially so close to Christmas, but I received it today, inspected everything after reading a few terrible reviews it included everything it stated and powered it on, but it was in New condition and everything was in working order, very pleased.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2021
reviews.name: Jessi
reviews.title: It's cool.
reviews.review: Really cool,feels different than the normal one. Bummer that the game isn't included which makes more sense to have it included than not. The charger broke after short use.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2021
reviews.name: F Lamprea
reviews.title: Cute and Worked
reviews.review: The most important thing is that it came and it worked. On a secondary note, I enjoy the green and blue aesthetic as well as the Animal Crossing designs on the back of the main screen. I used this system to play Animal Crossing: New Horizons, Monster Hunter Stories 2, Monster Hunter Rise, and Just Dance 2021. It worked fine with all of them.An important thing to note is: It does not come with the ‘Animal Crossing: New Horizons’ game. The game is not included with this console.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2020
reviews.name: Stephen
reviews.title: It is a Nintendo Switch with extra cuteness attached.
reviews.review: I seized the opportunity to get this particular switch at non-scalpy prices! (You know who you are.Shame)This is a v2 switch and operates like any other.You just so happen to have the nice color scheme and an adorable image of the nooks printed on the dock.Really this review is more about Nintendo re-releasing plentiful units of this edition amidst many people trying to take advantage of others.Thank you very much, Nintendo!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2022
reviews.name: Nikki Raye Marshall
reviews.title: Arrived Quickly, Easy to Setup
reviews.review: I bought a new Switch after my old one had such bad stick drift it was basically unplayable. I got the Animal Crossing edition because it was so cute. It arrived two days before it was expected, in perfect condition. It was surprisingly easy to transfer my Nintendo account and user data from the old Switch. My husband had it done before I got out of the shower. Ready to play in about 20 minutes!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2021
reviews.name: A
reviews.title: Joycon Drift
reviews.review: I got the switch veryyy late so I’m not sure why they’re still releasing console with joycons that still have the joycon drift. The drift has been an issue for a long time now, and I see that it still was not fixed in the newer consoles they’ve released this year. I’ve been using it for only 2 months and the drift gets worse and worse. The AC version is extremely cute though. All the details make this edition very special. Just wish I could use the joycons that come with it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2020
reviews.name: Luis
reviews.title: Didn’t look new
reviews.review: The box right out the package was damaged and it had someone’s info sticker you get on your items from picking it up at bestbuy. Once opening it i noticed the foam wrapping for the items was all crumpled up like someone had changed their mind about throwing them away. I have a feeling this item was already owned by someone but they didn’t feel like listing it as that. Pretty scummy. Everything was their and working perfectly but I thought I was buying this brand new, I guess not.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2021
reviews.name: Anna Quigley
reviews.title: Does NOT come with Animal Crossing.
reviews.review: Does NOT come with Animal Crossing, which was the whole reason we purchased this one. My kids and I were very disappointed. It's only Animal Crossing themed. It's in fine print on the box, but I missed that when purchasing.As far as the Switch goes, we like it a lot. I would suggest they allow individual time limits for each user, instead of one global time limit.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2022
reviews.name: allie
reviews.title: Works great
reviews.review: I had been wanting a switch for a little time now and was glad I came across this. The price is exactly where it should be and the console works perfectly. Have had this product for a couple months now and havent had an issue since.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2022
reviews.name: Jackie2012
reviews.title: Well worth the price.
reviews.review: I play this an embarrassing number of hours every week. I love the design and I play on it often. Too often but what can I say? I love gaming. Great for handheld or playing with others on the big screen. would certainly recommend this to someone who loves playing games either alone, with family, or, if you purchase the online package, with complete strangers.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2021
reviews.name: Brandy Robinson
reviews.title: Good Buy‼️
reviews.review: I purchased this system for my 3 year old son. It arrived earlier than expected brand new in the box. Although Animal crossing is to advanced for my son, ie. he can’t read the subtitles, I play the game and I love it. ( I’m 41) haha but you won’t be disappointed with the purchase. I also purchased a few other Nintendo switch games and enjoy them as well. One recommendation I would pass on is “not” buying the actual game cartridge but buying the downloadable version as you won’t worry about losing the tiny cartridge as my son did, but we later fixed them, I was upset at the thought of $60 dollars going down the drain as I should have bought the download so I wouldn’t have that issue. Enjoy ☺️

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2020
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: An actual product review.
reviews.review: Here is an actual product review, not an opinion on the sellers business ethics. To start, I bought this solely because it's the limited edition version. It does not come with the animal crossing game however, so keep that in mind. The product is exactly as advertised and was completely new and unused. Absolute perfection. The price is not ideal, but Amazon has amazing financing options. So overall it's a beautiful device and so very cute. I definitely don't regret buying.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2021
reviews.name: Marco
reviews.title: Very lucky and love the animal crossing switch
reviews.review: I love the animal crossing switch! I have been waiting for this product to restock for a long time. On October 13 2020 i got very lucky. I was browsing amazon and i saw the animal crossing switch on nintendo products, i clicked on it and it was at 300$ its msrp price and brand new. I immediately bought the product and have loved it since. It is now February 19 and i keep on forgetting to write a review so now i am. Overall amazing product and recommend to wait it out for the restock. October 13 was a restock day for all switches because any switch i clicked on it was at msrp price.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2021
reviews.name: cody wolf
reviews.title: Works great but game is not included
reviews.review: I bought this so me and my GF could play animal Crossing together it does not come off the game so of your getting it as a gift keep that in mind

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2020
reviews.name: Martin Torres
reviews.title: The kobe to the (PC masterace) Shaq
reviews.review: Im a pc gamer but i wanted a portable console to play my rpgs and single player games when im in bed.The convenience of the switch has helped me relax after many stressful sweaty fps, or competitive games i play.I havent owned a nintendo product since the launch of the ds light and im pretty happy with this product and the colorscheme.Im 26 and will never be to old to enjoy my console.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2022
reviews.name: Katy
reviews.title: Used, dirty, broken.
reviews.review: When I got this product I was so excited. All that excitement fell flat when I unboxed the console and found that the product that I bought new was actually (obviously) used. There were spots on the screen that were not cleanable and likely to affect gameplay. Not that I would know, because the console would not charge. Maybe that's because the charger was chipped and dirty. The whole thing had someone else's dirt all over it. It was like they barely attempted to clean the thing and then thought it passed as new because they wrapped it in plastic. I have videos and pictures of the issues but Amazon isn't letting me attach them to my review for some reason. I am returning the product and getting a new one from Nintendo.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2021
reviews.name: Buffy
reviews.title: Animal Crossing Switch is Perfect!
reviews.review: I love the cute cradle design and the joycon colors are awesome! The console has an Animal Crossing design on the back side but I keep mine in the cradle most of the time. Everything works perfect, lots of games to choose from, and of course the Animal Crossing New Horizons game is the best! I have spent way too many hours playing away on my island. For the amount of time and enjoyment I have gotten out of the Switch it's easily the best purchase I made in 2020.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2021
reviews.name: A F
reviews.title: Broke in ONE day/won't turn on
reviews.review: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter. She was so happy and excited when she opened it. She played it Christmas day and the following when we went to her grandparent's house. She played it a total of 24hrs. She went to bed the night of the 26th and put it on the charger. Woke up the next morning and it would not turn on. Today is the 29th and it still won't turn on. I'm returning it. I furious that I wasted my money on this but even more so because my daughter is so upset because she enjoyed it for a day and has a collection of games that Santa, her older sister and myself gave here. All these games and she can't even play them. Returning the unit.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2020
reviews.name: kristen beck
reviews.title: This is such an awesome switch!
reviews.review: This is my first switch, and I was so happy to find any switch back in stock! I saw this special one, and loved it! I love animal crossing! The box, and console are so much more beautiful in person! Powers up great, and was very easy to set up! Tried playing a couple games I have and it works great! A limited edition switch for the same price as the regular one was amazing! I recommend this to everyone!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2021
reviews.name: Bree
reviews.title: Made my kids happy.
reviews.review: I picked the animal crossing edition thinking the higher price it would come with the game NOPE. my fault for not reading. However coming back to leave this review I noticed the price I paid and the price it is now, it's much lower now.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2020
reviews.name: Rebecca
reviews.title: JUST GET IT !! It’s worth it
reviews.review: Super cute! I saw some reviews that said they felt the quality of the joy cons were bad but I don’t feel like that. Everything feels super sturdy! Everything is here and packaged well. Even came one week earlier than expected. Battery life is way better than the first switch and the switch lites.I definitely recommend getting it but only if it’s at the regular $299 price. Don’t fall for the people selling it for 4-$500!!!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2021
reviews.name: Alexandra Garilli
reviews.title: Super happy with my purchase
reviews.review: The Animal Crossing is gone and I wanted one. This was the cheapest seller I could find. I was very nervous as the time came closer that my switch was coming.Was super excited when it got here and it was in fact an animal crossing switch.Yeah I paid 80 bucks more then the regular retail price, but every where was sold out and I wanted one before we wouldn’t be able to get them at all.I just wanted to say that it came as described. Animal Crossing switch and in prefect conditions. Unopened box, everyone wrapped in its place and nothing missing.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2021
reviews.name: Shy
reviews.title: Read edit!!
reviews.review: Super cute switch! I bought it after playing animal crossing since release, I use it for my second island! It also came pretty quickly I’m very pleased!Edit**I’ve had it for a little over a month and it stopped working!!! My left joycon won’t work at all I’ve even tried other joycons. I already have to send back to Nintendo and risk loosing it in mail I’m super upsetEdit 2***The dock also broke.... like I’ve purchased Nintendo products for a long time never had a issue. Don’t but this

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2021
reviews.name: Silvia F.
reviews.title: Eventually breaks
reviews.review: Bought this item sometime back. Don't play it often, mainly because I have the switch lite.Though my nephew plays it more. Recently he tired to dock it to the tv and the docking station no longer works. We've changed up the chords, checked the tv plug ins and nothing. Oh well I guess. As long as the switch itself is still playable I can't get too mad. It just sucks though.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2020
reviews.name: Paige HorseChief
reviews.title: Flawless Delivery
reviews.review: It arrived today safe and sound in the original packaging without any tampering or damage. The box is of course placed in a standard Amazon box with extra cushioning, so it is well protected. It is indeed a legitimate Animal Crossing edition switch, and everything works exactly as it should! I'm so glad I waited for this restock rather than buying one from scalpers elsewhere. This edition is even more beautiful in person!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2021
reviews.name: Taylor Shearer
reviews.title: Screen image burn
reviews.review: We have officially had our switch for 6 months. It was used almost daily by strictly adults and has been well cared for.But, within the last 2 weeks the screen is streaking all the way across.I'm highly disappointed in this. We purchased an extra controller and 5 games. I feel like I have wasted my time and money when I could have bought a PS4 and not had this problem.I looked it up and this is a common problem with the consoles. Hopefully this helps someone else make their desicion.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2021
reviews.name: C. zellner
reviews.title: Fun, simple gaming experience. No censorship.
reviews.review: I haven't enjoyed a Nintendo console this much since N64.The mobile feature is pretty cool.No Netflix and extra stuff.Eshop is simple.System processes games quickly.Worst part is the peripheral devices and other things are expensive.Games don't deflate much in value, and then people buy up the physical copies.The eShop will help you get those hard to find games.Nintendo doesn't censor games either. Very important.!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2021
reviews.name: Shirley
reviews.title: No sound when connected with a monitor
reviews.review: I only use it to play zelda and connect with a monitor without audio output. I do not like the fact that when the switch is connected to a monitor, there is just no sound. Bought one blue tooth transmit device and did not work. Felt dizzy in the beginning, and later Feel much better.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2021
reviews.name: PhoenixFire
reviews.title: TV mode is the best!!
reviews.review: At first I was a bit hesitant due to some of the one star reviews, but I am NOT disappointed.I was upgrading from a switch lite and tv mode is the best thing EVER!Playing NES games on the tv screen reminds me of playing with the wii As a kid. I love it!!Plus I was an animal crossing addict going into this and right now I am 80 hours into the game!If you aren’t sure, but it! You won’t regret it!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2022
reviews.name: jenna Richards
reviews.title: Was exactly what it said it was!
reviews.review: I was really skeptical purchasing this switch off Amazon based off of the reviews, but I went for it and so glad I did! It came brand new, no scratches and in its original packaging. I have been playing on it everyday since I got it with no issues as well. In my opinion, I think the Animal Crossing switch is the safest one to purchase on here since it has the best reviews.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2020
reviews.name: Melissa Lloyd
reviews.title: Most definitely worth the wait
reviews.review: I wanted one of these bad bois back in March, I missed preorder and didn’t wanna pay $500 or more. I’m beyond happy that Nintendo decided to release more of these. The console is beautiful in person and was 1000% worth the wait. Snag one of these while you can!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2021
reviews.name: Nicholas
reviews.title: You need it in your Life
reviews.review: With all the choices in consoles today along with the price tag and a descent media library of games one may be indecisive about choosing which to acquire , well the Nintendo Switch is by far the easiest most versatile handheld or docked system there is. Wether your a pc or console gamer the switch seems to be in a class of its own and every enthusiast should have one in there gaming arsenal. Excellent

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2020
reviews.name: Genevieve Willis
reviews.title: Great console, make sure to buy a microSD!
reviews.review: Got the console when it had been restocked for the standard console price, and I adore it! It is so cute and pretty, and the back of the device has a print with a nice laquered texture. Overall great, only issue would be the lack of storage, which is easily remedied with a microSD card, but for the price it really should have at least included one.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2022
reviews.name: m
reviews.title: finally have the animal crossing switch of my dreams <33
reviews.review: the older reviews seem to be bad due to the seller originally upcharging a lot! i got the acnh switch for $299 & it’s legitimate & works great!! i give it a 4/5 because nintendo really makes their switches too fragile :/ i was so careful with it (while waiting for screen protector & case) & still managed to get a few scrapesmon the screen & many scrapes on the back :((( but other than that it works fine. injust heavy recommend getting a screen protector and clear cover case before even opening it haha

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2022
reviews.name: Lex
reviews.title: Broke on its own
reviews.review: So I barely play on my switch. So I tried to use it two weeks ago and no matter what jon con i use the screen goes back and forth very quickly on the games.I cant get to settings or nothing. Its like it has a mind of its own. Really upset about it, i worked great the first week i beat pokemon shield... now it just doesn't work, no wonder it was on sale

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2020
reviews.name: Briyana Chataigne
reviews.title: Beautiful Console
reviews.review: These came back in stock in the beginning of October, and I was quick to snatch one up for my niece. She absolutely adores it and is happy with it. I originally planned to buy it as a Christmas gift, but didn't want to chance it going out of stock again. This is definingly worth the $300 price tag, but no more. She was also able to easily transfer her data from her Switch Lite, which is now going to her younger sister. If I didn't already own a Switch myself, I would pick this up for the color scheme alone!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2020
reviews.name: Ronald
reviews.title: Five Shooting Stars Across the Board
reviews.review: Notice how people who have verified purchases have only given 5-star reviews (as of this writing on 18 March 2020). This is for a reason.I love this system. It is the most beautiful combination of the Switch backing, Joy-Cons, and dock that Nintendo has ever released for the Switch. The overall design, especially Nook and the Nooklings on the dock, is so cute and the pastel colors for the Joy-Cons, like all other Joy-Con colors, look so much better in person. I'm so happy to be a huge fan of Animal Crossing and receive such a beautiful Switch.Nintendo needs to manufacture a lot more of this Animal Crossing edition Switch and they need to make more themed Switches in the future. If you don't have a Switch and you can get this one at a *reasonable* price, don't hesitate to purchase it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2021
reviews.name: Katherine D
reviews.title: Frustrating, defective dock
reviews.review: Switch works but dock is defective. Will not connect to tv. New tv, have tried everything, does not connect. Contacted Nintendo customer support and went through all the troubleshooting steps. Doesn’t work. They said the only option is to mail the dock for repair and that takes 2-3 weeks. Kinda crazy they won’t just mail a new dock since this one arrived defective.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2020
reviews.name: Pleased
reviews.title: Just buy in a store!!!!
reviews.review: I dont ever leave reviews but this is something else. The switch came and works everything is there but theres literally a blue line across the entire screen and is so annoying looking at it and seeing it while playing games. After three hours of being told to only return like i finally got one after being sold out for forever, they finally are going to just replace it but still have to wait two months for a replacement cause guess what? Sold out already! Thats better than not getting one at all though. Just glad after talking with 4 people they finally listened to my point of view. Really annoying and frustrating. Never buying electronics online again. Espically not from amazon.Edit: i got a replacement and the screen is actually not broken this time. Would still buy in store because of how hard it was to even get a replacement but i got one so thats all that matters. Console is great when its not broke and it is beautiful.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2022
reviews.name: Jessica Preston
reviews.title: Works Perfectly
reviews.review: A large majority of the negative reviews are people complaining about the price when this product was being price gouged in 2020, but let me tell you, it’s a perfectly good price now.System is sleek and easy to set up, making it a very stress-free situation.Everything is well documented so that you can have the easiest time setting up your console.Personally, I got the AC switch and it’s absolutely adorable!Only grief I have is that the console came a day early so I have to just let it sit for a day until I get my case, screen protector, and other games. Not the fault of anyone though

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2020
reviews.name: A. Song
reviews.title: In Love with the Design
reviews.review: I am absolutely smitten with the design. Love the white and minimalistic dock, the muted green and blue controllers that are still bright enough to give a pop of color in light. I wish the bezel of the unit was white instead of black to continue the aesthetic, but I love the etched designs on the back regardless. Very easy to set up with my TV by following instructions on the console.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2020
reviews.name: Aitana
reviews.title: Super cute!
reviews.review: Works perfectly and is super cute. The left joystick is a little finicky but I know that is a running problem with the Switch in general and not something that is the seller's fault. I was so happy to finally be able to find a Switch for the actual amount it is supposed to be, and even better that it was the Animal Crossing one! Thank you so much for not being one of those greedy merchants who have jacked the price of the Switch up $100-$200.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2021
reviews.name: Phalon Conn
reviews.title: Hours of Fun!
reviews.review: I had purchased this from the Amazon Warehouse, the console was listed as used, but don't let that fool you!The console was in pristine condition, not a single scratch on it.I love playing on this Switch, whether it is Mario Kart or the older games provided by Nintendo's service.It is definitely worth getting the barebones but you will need to buy games and memories cards for it especially if you are planning to get digital downloads.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2021
reviews.name: Missi Bidinger
reviews.title: Dead in the water in exactly 1.5 months
reviews.review: Had fun when it worked, out of the box I had some pretty annoying constant disconnecting of the joycons every couple seconds. After a couple resets of the controllers they’d work for a week or two then do it again. Now here we are, console won’t turn on or charge, not responding to a hard reset or any other tricks ive read online. Absolute wast of time and money. More than likely I’ll warranty it and sell it, it’s been an absolute headache to own.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2021
reviews.name: Jeff Gosnell
reviews.title: My kids loved it!
reviews.review: The base station is the thing that is Animal Crossing branded. And my daughter LOVED it!It also was a $1 cheaper than the standard Switch. So, bonus?!!Besides the pastel green and blue of the joy-con, the Nintendo Switch is your standard device. I bought a second set of joy-cons. So, we have the red, blue, pastel blue, and pastel green joy-cons, which make it fun and unique.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2021
reviews.name: Vicki Sanders
reviews.title: Kid's Christmas wish list item
reviews.review: As I scrambled to get one of these before supplies disappeared, another family member bought one too. I didn't even open it, but the kid got the other one as an early present from an adult family member that wanted her to be able to play games with his son (and him). So who really lacked patience here??? lol

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2020
reviews.name: jay
reviews.title: BE PATIENT DONT BUY FROM A SCALPER
