reviews.review: i managed to snag mine when they were available for the retail pricing, not 500! its ridiculous that these scalpers can get away with this but i knew back in march that these would be available again and waited. they are not limited edition, just special edition! as for the quality of the switch its perfect, exactly what you would expect but with cute colors! not worth a scalper! do not buy this for more than retail price!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2020
reviews.name: Parrish C. Moore
reviews.title: What a beautiful console.
reviews.review: This console is beautiful! I'm not a huge Animal Crossing fan but the new game did catch my eye even more when this Switch was announced. The pastel colors really work on the Switch, along with the design on the back. What really tempted me to buy this specific one was that it is the second version of the Switch. Which of course includes better battery life. I'm sure you've heard this all before, so I won't go any longer. It's a very pretty console and if you have your chance to get your hands on it for the normal market price. I'd suggest that you go for it!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2021
reviews.name: Matt Robinson
reviews.title: Very Grateful
reviews.review: I don't have much to say because I'm antiquing the console, missing was being bought up by scalpers and possibly people like myself but I am very happy to have this at the MSRP price point. The switch wasn't sealed but these boxes never are, looks immaculate and would love to have it on my shelf for the next 20 years. I'd argue that the design of this switch dock is better than the new game.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2021
reviews.name: Troy9009
reviews.title: Bought for my wife
reviews.review: I was tired of fighting over the switch so I purchased this to enjoy mine once more.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2021
reviews.name: Alina
reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.review: I’m not much of a video game person, but my boyfriend convinced me to buy the switch. I love it! I see why all the hype haha. Very easy to bring around too. I like how I get to play by myself, play with a group when I have guests over, or play overcook with my boo to get some laughters in.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2021
reviews.name: Adrian Clapp
reviews.title: Beautiful console, reasonable price.
reviews.review: This system is so beautiful and I got it for not too much more than the actual retail price! On top of it all I received it within days of ordering, picked it up early from the post office and I’ve played it at least once a day since owning it. The fact that it’s the updated version of the Switch with a better battery life means I can play longer on the go, and I don’t think a review of this version of the console would be complete without mentioning the gorgeous Animal Crossing New Horizons designs on the box and dock. The dock is completely white as opposed to the standard black, and features adorable artwork of Tom Nook, Timmy, and Tommy on a deserted island. The joy cons being a pastel green and blue instead of the neon I’ve grown accustomed to with my parent’s Switch is a great contrast. All in all this is a system I’d highly recommend if you love Animal Crossing and definitely something for a collector to pick up along the way! 100% my favorite special edition version of a console!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2021
reviews.name: Fawne
reviews.title: best thing
reviews.review: this is my favorite thing that i own. i love being an adult with a job that allows me to make stupid purchases like this that bring infinite joy to my mostly sad life. i can’t believe that i can now play skyrim on my lap. thanks nintendo for giving me something to hold onto. this has added at least three years onto my lifespan.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2021
reviews.name: Sarah
reviews.title: Great find. Great Seller. Amazing deal!
reviews.review: I've read a lot of comments about being price gouged. I don't feel the same. Honestly it's a rare switch that I have wanted and the extra $100 was definitely worth it. I own it now, brand new in the box. My hands are the only hands that have touched it. It works flawlessly and it really makes me happy seeing the limited edition art work on it. The joy cons don't drift. It is the newer more sought after model and this company got it to me quick! Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2021
reviews.name: Robert Smith
reviews.title: It’s cool for kids
reviews.review: In all reality it’s OK for kids to play. But it’s for adults unless you’re really Into games it’sdifferent. The price is fair thing I didn’t Buy itduring the pandemic. These price went thro the roof!! The product is good but I don’t really like it as much as I thought I was gonna like it the games the feel of the consul. So I just recently sent mines back.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2021
reviews.name: Angel
reviews.title: Fast and easy Refund
reviews.review: The product was as described.For the first few days everything was great.Everything worked and came new and in the proper packaging.After a few days of using it, one of the controller buttons started failing.We requested a full refund, and the seller was fast and hustle-free to approve and get return label.I would buy from them again.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2021
reviews.name: Tal
reviews.title: My best ever purchase
reviews.review: This is the best item I’ve ever purchased!! It’s super fun to play at home on the tv and at work on my break. The outside with the Nooks is adorable and even the back of the tablet is engraved with animal crossing designs! I’d recommend getting a screen protector to protect it as you will be sliding the screen into the dock and although I haven’t scratched it I would be nervous to.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020
reviews.name: LonReview
reviews.title: Excellent Switch, not so good shipping.
reviews.review: The Nintendo switch is quite nice and good looking.But, the package box I received does not have any protection in it.I guess my switch had a really good time shaking.I have not check if my switch got any damage, But if it does, I am gonna return it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2021
reviews.name: Cortessa
reviews.title: I love it
reviews.review: I really wanted a switch. I played with my boyfriends all the time and was waiting for the right time financially to get me my own. I saw this one and love animal crossing. I will say, the joycons are the cutest colors I have seen them in. I love my switch and my dock. I also love the little details on the back

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2020
reviews.name: a custom
reviews.title: Cute edition and peaceful colors
reviews.review: Very beautiful and cute edition. Fast delivery. And feel lucky to get one during the 30 minutes' window on release date.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2020
reviews.name: Kat S
reviews.title: What a piece of_____!
reviews.review: What a piece of C____! It’s Christmas so I cannot get any help and the thing cannot communicate with servers yet my phone is connected to the server playing the same game my daughter is trying to get on to play. Error codes are a joke. Cannot connect with server cannot load any game codes. Kid just wants to return it now. She is frustrated I’m frustrated. Her Xbox never had this issue. Returning this ASAP.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2021
reviews.name: Matthew
reviews.title: No issues
reviews.review: Came in a neat and new box with no damage or signs of being opened. Handheld came in all the proper packaging and it booted up brand new. Came in the charger and everything it should and we had no issues with it. Only sad thing is it didn’t come with animal crossing on it but it didn’t say it would I personally would have just liked to see that included so no hate for that. My girlfriend loves it and uses it for Dead by Daylight, Pokémon, Hulu and Netflix

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2022
reviews.name: Joshua Bidwell
reviews.title: Childhood memories
reviews.review: The product came early and is a great addition to the house. I have been able to play some older NES games and it has taken me back to my childhood. A online membership and your all set to download the NES system and play away. Even the newer games are good and a joy to play.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2020
reviews.name: Kaylin
reviews.title: I've been desperate
reviews.review: With all this quarantine. I should have known to buy this product waaaayyyyy before all of it. But, I've been very desperate into wanting a switch and I finally had the time and money ( yes its outrageously expensive, but it's a definite need if you haven't bought one yet).Received mine two days after I placed my order, and fell in love the moment I opened the package.I've always been a BIG fan of Animal Crossing since the Gamecube version come out ( I still play it at times ) and honestly, having this makes me very happy! So, thank you so much for still having this up!!!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2021
reviews.name: Megan W.
reviews.title: Great Value!
reviews.review: Compact and easy to charge, I do not recommend for small children as the controller pieces feel delicate and I'd worry they'd be broken. I highly recommend getting a carry case to protect your device when not in use or charging. Beautiful pastel colors and adorable design based on animal crossing. Suprisingly this was cheaper than the blue and red switch which was great because I like the design of this better.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2021
reviews.name: Michelle Frye
reviews.title: Great system
reviews.review: Apparently amazon doesn't like when you call them out in a review and won't post it. Delivery sucked. Driver was a pos. 2nd person I talked to on here for help was awesome. System is great. Only paid 299 for it. I wasn't ripped off into paying more. I've been playing this game since day of the very first release. One of my favorite games.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2021
reviews.name: Kindle Customer
reviews.title: Game arrived with everything safely, nothing was damaged.
reviews.review: The game that arrived was exactly the one pictured, and all the pieces were working and packaged nicely. The reason this review gets 4 starts is because of the price. Why is this version almost 60 dollars extra if the game isn't included. I could've bought this exactly console version (animal crossing) from Best Buy for 300 dollars, but we have to pay extra of amazon even though the game isn't included.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2021
reviews.name: The.Bakers
reviews.title: Love my ACNH Nintendo Switch *_*
reviews.review: We're Aussies living in Germany right now where the Animal Crossing Console ist still sold out so we bought it on Amazon US from Widget One LLC. Just make sure its a genuine company not a private person. We got the console for not more than the classic Nintendo Switch would cost including import fees and tax. We even got some import fees back from Amazon. And what can I say, I'm totally happy with the new Switch. Love the special Joy Cons, the special AC painting on the back and the special Animal Crossing Charging Station. I even got a Message in game from Animas crossing about the new special Joy Cons. The Animal Crossing Switch has the already new battery build in. I totally recommend to buy the switch if you're an Animal Crossing fan and don't have a switch already.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2021
reviews.name: Andrew Hunt
reviews.title: Only one I found for MSRP.
reviews.review: You can hear the spring inside my left joycon when you move it, other than that, beats expectations. Game selection is huge on the switch, mostly indie developers, but I'm sure there's something for everyone.Wasn't a fan of the pastel colors but DBrand has nice skins for it, I got one that's the "breakdown" skin where it looks transparent.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2022
reviews.name: Taylor D.
reviews.title: This will give you the serotonin to get through your day
reviews.review: Sooo great! Can be played on your tv to play with friends or you can play as you pace aimlessly. Makes quarantine and life in general better. Do it for you!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2020
reviews.name: Maria Stipes
reviews.title: Works great
reviews.review: The product came with everything and is exactly what it’s supposed to be and it works great😊 i didn’t know it didn’t come with the game though so I was kinda sad but it’s still cute and I love it. Literally best thing I bought so far off amazon. It also came in literal paper from Canada though lol I had to be home for them to deliver because it said worth 500 on it 😂

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2021
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Perfectly Splendid
reviews.review: I ordered this on March 26th and received it April 3rd! The original delivery date was April 28th, so I was pleasantly surprised! The switch was in perfect condition. Everything was included and packaged perfectly. Thank you to everyone who filled, shipped and delivered my package! My heart is happy.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2021
reviews.name: F. Bartholomew
reviews.title: It was JUST as expected.
reviews.review: Not much to say other than - this is what she (my daughter) wanted and that is what we got. The only negative thing I have to mention is that the screen protectors are really fragile to handle while putting them on (she busted the first one) - but that is not a mark on the actual Nintendo Switch.I'd say it's a 10 out of 10!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2021
reviews.name: Jennifer L.
reviews.title: Love it and great colors!
reviews.review: Do I even need to write a review for this I mean honestly who doesn't know that this is amazing. Espercially the animal crossing version which people were hoarding like toilet paper to sell for double or even triple the price that it supposed to be. Well I finally got one for the regular price scalpers!!!! Love it!!! Colors are great

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2022
reviews.name: Millie
reviews.title: Would recommend to a friend
reviews.review: I love Nintendo switch feels good to play old school games but when my package got delivered today it got delivered in my neighbors house not mines so who ever did it needs to learn how to follow instructions cause is a lot of money to be thrown out like that

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2021
reviews.name: Scott
reviews.title: Worth it!
reviews.review: It’s such a cute pattern and I’m glad I waited long enough for these to be back in stock! I love the design and having the Nook’s watch me play animal crossing is the best. I would definitely get thumb pads to make the Switch extra cute! The device itself hasn’t given me any problems, but I would for sure get an micro-sd for it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2022
reviews.name: S. Martinez
reviews.title: Great!
reviews.review: Mom of the year award for this purchase! I think this is still a little over priced base on what they are being sold for in the store. The remotes seem cheap, the make a rattle noise and the joysticks get stuck and your characters keep running! Otherwise works great!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2020
reviews.name: Maricruz Sanchez
reviews.title: Love love love LOVE
reviews.review: Excuse my mess in the back! I absolutely love my new switch! It came in brand new and everything works just fine! It’s super cute and super fun to play! Setting everything up was easy and I got a few games I’m super excited about! I’m also happy I got the price at 299 and nothing over! So I feel super happy I didn’t over pay for it!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2020
reviews.name: Kristina Garcia
reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review: So, I honestly wasn't sure whether I should buy this or not since I've never played an Animal Crossing game before New Horizons. However, it has quickly become my most played game on the switch and it is so awesome to be able to play it on a system that looks this gorgeous. I don't know if this will go back in stock but I would recommend this to any Animal Crossing fans out there. My favorite part is definitely the island etchings on the back!Do not support scalpers!! I bought this system for $300 dollars and scalpers are out there trying to sell it for more than twice of the MSRP! If no one buys from them they will have no choice but to lower the price to a more reasonable level.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2021
reviews.name: Kerry
reviews.title: Don't Buy O.O .... Im Joking lol 🤣
reviews.review: This is an amazing gaming system no matter what anyone says their is alot of positive things about the Switch i could say but I'm not, what i am going to point out is that i gave a 4 star because when i bought it i found out most of the games my wife wanted to play was not available or was never going to be made for the system no matter how many people complained lol but it's still an awesome system to have for yourself or for your kids to keep them entertained while you get stuff done 😀

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2020
reviews.name: Beth A Marks
reviews.title: Thanks for the free game Nintendo. Oh wait. Nada.
reviews.review: Nothing like buying a game system for $300 and not getting a game to play on it. Ball break for a kid who saved up their money for the system and now has to drop $30-$70 per game. Otherwise neat flexible system for gaming.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2022
reviews.name: Rhonda Greynolds
reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.review: I absolut3ly love the fact that it's not like the original switch colors. My daughter is extremely jealous because she got the original colors. The only thing I didn't like is that it wasn't made clear how to transfer save data from one console to the other. I thought I had transferred it correctly, but ended up having to start my game over because of this.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2020
reviews.name: JayDe
reviews.title: The Holy Grail of Nintendo Switch's
reviews.review: You will never understand the hell I went through to obtain this relic. While it was hell in the moment, I can now look back at those memories of hunting this down with my girlfriend. Feels like we accomplished an impossible task, and will forever have a story attached to it.Me: 2 - Scalpers: 0

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2022
reviews.name: Gina Clabo
reviews.title: Love
reviews.review: This is so fun and beautiful cover. Works great please note that the Animal Crossing game does not come with this, sad to to say for the price it should have in my opinion, nevertheless it's still great buy. Recommend...

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2020
reviews.name: Space Cowboy
reviews.title: Great Special Edition Switch
reviews.review: Very Impressed with the depth of this special edition, In the past, the previous Special Editions have been cool, But I feel this one surpasses them all, The two-tone Joy-Cons are great, As is the Dock and backplate. The Joycon holder is about the same as other switches, Just a basic black. But Everything else is great!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2021
reviews.name: Xanthiar
reviews.title: So Cute!
reviews.review: This will be my third Switch system. 1 is my boyfriends, a Switch Lite and now this beauty. This is by far my favorite system, and the Animal Crossing theme is just so delightful

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2020
reviews.name: AlderGod
reviews.title: A sweet gift
reviews.review: Long story short, 17 years ago, my mom sat on Animal Crossing for the Gamecube and played 8 hours straight until she got the gold statue before me. I was 15 years old, and upset.So when this console came out, I bought it for her as her reward for beating me all those years ago.It was the best gift.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2021
reviews.name: Julia Genard
reviews.title: Wonderful!
reviews.review: Hello. I’m Jennifer and I purchased this on a family members account.This Switch is adorable and we love it so much. I’m so glad I took the time to read reviews and find the company that would deliver the best product for the price. It works very well and we couldn’t be happier. I highly recommend this.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2020
reviews.name: Oceana
reviews.title: No Regrets
reviews.review: -1 Star because I hate price gougers, and I normally wouldn't ever support them for something like this, but I was behind the bus on the news about the release on this switch edition and decided if I was going to spend more on it I'd rather do it while it's still reasonable seeing as I was already spotting $700 ones which is outrageous. On another note the item came in pristine condition and as expected is very cute.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2020
reviews.name: leibnitz
reviews.title: did NOT come with animal crossing.
reviews.review: special edition console for a specific game and didn't even include the game?what a waste.my 10 yr old spent his own money to get this and was excited to have an included game right off the bat.but no.not included.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2020
reviews.name: Kady ♥
reviews.title: Damaged Box???
reviews.review: *Box came DAMAGED*The system itself is great, came with all the cables, accessories, and were undamaged. However, the shipping box was not damaged at all, only consoles original packaging was damaged in one corner leading me to believe it was dropped/damaged by the seller prior to being put in Amazon box.Hopefully this does not affect the system over time, overall it seems okay.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2021
reviews.name: Lua
reviews.title: Buy it for those Animal Crossing addicts!
reviews.review: Just as pictured. My son got it for me as a Mothers gift last year and finally writing a review. I absolutely love it. The colors are perfect and it's very pretty to look at.Literally was sold out during pandemic and now I'm so happy to have my very own.Highly recommended!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2021
reviews.name: luis carollo
reviews.title: Great for animal crossing fans
reviews.review: This Nintendo switch is a must for any animal crossing fan out there. The details are amazing and it goes well with any collection as a showcase piece or just to brag. Battery is very good and plays same as any other switch gen 2. The only downside is that it does not bring the game. My delivery was lighting fast too

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2021
reviews.name: Brittney Dell
reviews.title: Love having your own "To-Go Console" at your fingertips!
reviews.review: I love how you can change up how you play on this: playing with the controllers on the Nintendo switch itself or switching them to a controller and playing the kickstand screen!! Definitely a good buy!! Both of nieces want one now!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2021
reviews.name: Mable Marie
reviews.title: My system is corrupting and I have done NOTHING to it. That is bull.
reviews.review: I bought this BRAND NEW. I bought this brand new just to avoid this situation. Although I've heard I'm not the only one dealing with a corrupt system!!! I can't play or download any of the games I bought! I've tried completely wiping my system causing me to lose ALLmy data. I'm sorry I didn't return it in time, I'm sorry I dont have a car to get the things I need. This is the first thing in a long time that I got something nice...all I want is a replacement nothing more, nothing less. I don't have the money to do this again...

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2020
reviews.name: bigkwater4life
reviews.title: Cute
reviews.review: The animal crossing print and colors are cute. I got one of the newest ones with the better battery life according to the Nintendo website and my serial number. Pretty happy with this purchase!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2021
reviews.name: Razzmatazz
reviews.title: Bought it as a backup
reviews.review: So, this was an impulse buy. I plan to use my Switch for the next decade or so and my games better last that long. This was my back up in case my first Switch goes dead. Like I said, impulse, but the Animal Crossing edition is cute. Got one for my niece too.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2021
reviews.name: Jillian
reviews.title: Best Birthday Gift To Myself
reviews.review: Everything came as described and in great shape. I love playing my switch! It was supposed to take a little over a month to be delivered but was actually deliver a month early!!!! I’m so pleased!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2022
reviews.name: Christine
reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.review: I got it so I can mainly play Starred Valley while everyone watches tv, that way I'm not hogging up the TV just to play games.So far, I have no problems with the switch. The design is very cute, and controls are easy to learn, albeit difficult to get out of the ps4 controller mindset.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2021
reviews.name: JGirl
reviews.title: BIG ACNH FAN
reviews.review: I am a big Animal Crossing Fan so I got the chance to give my old switch on to someone who really wanted one but Mom didn't have the money to purchase it. I have no complaints what so ever but it would have been nice if the game had come as a package deal 😉

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2020
reviews.name: Annie
reviews.title: Nintendo should offer more special editions like this.
reviews.review: This is a wonderful console and design. I LOVE the joycon controllers, the design on the back on the console is GREAT! For me, what really stands out, is the dock. I'd buy a standard cream white switch dock in a heartbeat. This one is just so much better though. It's wonderful! You cannot go wrong with this console if you're an animal crossing fan or player. Made me very happy to open up.*******If you want to buy this but are worried you'd lose your island on your current switch, the island transfer tool on the eshop is super useful and helpful. Just make sure you follow the directions. It took about an hour to fully transfer my user data and island save data from my old switch to this new one. Happy Holidays :)

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2020
reviews.name: Kathy Varner
reviews.title: Not a happy customer
reviews.review: Very upset. I opened the box. On top where the screen and two joy cons were suppose to be, they weren't there. They were missing from the box. I lifted the top cardboard up and the rest of the stuff in the box was just thrown inside. It looked used.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2021
reviews.name: Ben D.
reviews.title: Probably the best portable on the market
reviews.review: I bought this to play Animal Crossing, but now all I do with it is play Skyrim for the hundreth time.Works great, 8/10

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2020
reviews.name: Nick Hohler
reviews.title: Decent
reviews.review: I enjoy the switch but the animal crossing game is not fun at all. Decent value with this package, but not for me.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2020
reviews.name: Joe Fill
reviews.title: Does not include game
reviews.review: It's baffling to me that this special edition console did not include the game, I have never ever seen that before, I've actually become so accustomed to special edition items coming with the game that I didn't even read the fine terms, I just assumed it came with the game, so I guess that's my fault for not reading the info.Still. I do not understand what the point of a special edition console is if there's no game relating to The reason why it's a special edition

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2021
reviews.name: Robyn
reviews.title: YAY!
reviews.review: I was sad I couldnt afford this when they first came out, but as soon as I seen they were able to make another set, I had to have it. So glad I got this, I got games that kind of require a tv to play with others. And I love animal crossing. The details on this switch is epic.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2020
reviews.name: CLAlexander
reviews.title: Seems less sturdy than Switch of a few years ago.
reviews.review: This seems less sturdy than the switch of 3 - 4 years ago.The Joy-Cons are less responsive and the unit "wiggles" in its base.A little disappointing as I expected the same "heft" and "quality" of the one purchased several years ago, especially for the same price.That's why 4 stars and not 5 stars.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2020
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Exactly as expected
reviews.review: Pretty colors and works well.Had an issue at first where the left joystick was charging slower than the right, but I re-synced the joysticks when the switch was in the dock and after that no problems.Had another issue where one time the image wouldn't show on the TV, and all I had to do was unplug everything, plug AC adapter into wall and also directly into switch (not dock), and then unplug and replug everything into TV.Every piece of tech has its occasional frustrating moments like this but it's been pretty easy to fix anything that comes up by googling solutions.The graphics are wonderful when playing on an HD TV.Note that the Animal Crossing: New Horizons game is NOT included.Go buy that too!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2021
reviews.name: J. Ingram
reviews.title: Way cuter than the original!
reviews.review: I love the adorable animal crossing decor on the base,the island pattern on the back of the main console is also super cute!The blue and green joy-con controllers are extra great because my friends and family all have the original version.It was worth the wait!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2020
reviews.name: Sara
reviews.title: Great console, avoid scalpers!
reviews.review: A beautiful console! And I was very happy with the price! I waited until the rerelease in late September to order, I paid $299 instead of paying the $500+ many did in March! It works just like the original as well as the same price! But the color pattern and pictures really are my personal favorite, I had no problem docking the console personally, I saw that that was an issue people were having. It doesn’t seem to scratch the screen whatsoever. No complaints here!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2021
reviews.name: Dani
reviews.title: 5 stars!
reviews.review: I love it! Works great and looks even better!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2021
reviews.name: Bahagirl
reviews.title: The best Christmas gift for my 10 yr old!
reviews.review: Purchased in early December and it arrived in 2 days with prime. Also purchased the animal crossing game along with it. Daughter was so surprised when she opened it and has been playing all day so it's definitely a hit!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2021
reviews.name: Kirstie Orozco
reviews.title: Came without AC adaptor???
reviews.review: I was so excited to see that my switch arrived today, about three weeks before the expected delivery date. However, upon unboxing, I learned that there was not an AC adaptor inside...only an HDMI cable. I’m sure that this is a random fluke, and it’s my luck to have something like this happen to me. But it’s very frustrating nonetheless. The switch itself will be great, I’m sure, once I’m able to play it. It’s super cute to look at, at least!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2021
reviews.name: boshk
reviews.title: do not buy, it does not come with the game.
reviews.review: it makes no sense that a game edition console would not even come with the game. what even is the point of that? when playstation comes out with a game edition console, the game comes with it. why not nintendo! other than that, it works like a normal switch would.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2022
reviews.name: haley h. ahn
reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE! Read my feedback first.
reviews.review: Seller sent Nintetndo Switch made for other countries. The power plug does NOT fit into USA outlets. Tried to contact seller several times which was ignored. Buyer Beware. We got it as Santa gift and my daughter was super disappointed.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2022
reviews.name: Brandon r
reviews.title: Not factory sealed, missing parts
reviews.review: Bought item listed as new, had been open, not sealed. No wrist straps as described, no hdmi cable as described. Bought as Xmas present so couldn't play until after going to buy hdmi cable days after Xmas. Misleading description

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2021
reviews.name: michele boor
reviews.title: What do I know? It’s on my granddaughter’s Christmas list.
reviews.review: I thought to hold out for the Switch new release, as that was all I had been hearing about, but decided to go ahead and get what I could while it was in stock. She’s seven. I’m sure she will be delighted.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2021
reviews.name: AmazonCustomer
reviews.title: VERY high-demand, limited edition. Worth it
reviews.review: The console is adorable and the battery life/display seemed a little better to me compared to my original switch. Vibrant and cute joy-cons. Very hard to find because Best Buy and Wal-Mart ran out and would not post more in stock. They said they couldn't pre-order/seemed unwilling to help before it was released months ago when I asked, and all had in-store pickup in locations hundreds of miles away when it finally came out. I was told they only make these and the replacement controllers in Japan when I asked about a pair at Gamestop. Don't know how true that is but it seems it. I still go easy on the cons to this day because of my fear of drift and damage

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2021
reviews.name: Sergio
reviews.title: Great versatile gaming console, Nintendo is back!
reviews.review: I got the Animal Crossing's Edition at $299, but I've seen price and editions vary from week to week. So far it's been as great as expected, I've been waiting to buy it for the las 2years, so the expectations were high enough. No complaints at all, NIntendo did it again and they're definitiely back in business in the gaming console world.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2021
reviews.name: JMuir
reviews.title: Was glad to find.. price was increased slightly.
reviews.review: I was afraid these wouldn’t come back in stock in stores… so I paid the upcharge for someone selling it online. It arrived quickly and looks to be new. Gifting for Christmas.. fingers crossed all is good!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2021
reviews.name: Penny Hosmer
reviews.title: So cute
reviews.review: I adore this themed Switch. So cute and happy that I was able to get one shortly after release.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2021
reviews.name: Miguel
reviews.title: It’s a Nintendo switch
reviews.review: Nothing special about this, it’s just a Nintendo switch, battery is a little bit better, and nothing else, oh and the animal cross design does come off easily, so buy a clear case of that matters to you.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2021
reviews.name: hamilton andrade
reviews.title: Nintendo makes fun consoles
reviews.review: Love it just sucks when I buy something I want to take care of but accidentally drop it is a pain in the ass

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2021
reviews.name: David
reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase
reviews.review: Came on-time and in perfect condition.Awesome. I love the joy-con colors. I'm not much of an Animal Crossing player, but my wife LOVES New Horizons.Has a pretty long battery life. I've played Breath of the Wild on it for 6+ hours and the battery didn't die. 10/10 would definitely recommend if you can find one.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2021
reviews.name: Stephanie Riegel
reviews.title: Wonderful console.
reviews.review: I have been having so much fun playing games on the Switch. I love the fact that it can go with you, or while docked play on your TV screen. I also enjoy that you can play single player or multi-player games with it, since each side becomes a separate controller. It is easy to use, and very lightweight.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2021
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Fun, easy to use.
reviews.review: Love this. Got it as a Christmas/Birthday/wedding anniversarygift all in one this year and cant be happier with my gift. Play it almost daily. Great for traveling, hooking up to the tv, or my laptop, or just for sitting around enjoying the day. Gives me something yo do while on the road. Best gift. Great charging port love the design.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2022
reviews.name: Candace
reviews.title: I love it
reviews.review: I got it for my birthday. It’s awesome.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2021
reviews.name: Astraphell
reviews.title: Very transportable.
reviews.review: No issues so far. Purchased a month ago.Everything still working as it should, controllers are still developing their wear pattern. All in all very nice. Arrived in New box, with everything in protective plastic.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2022
reviews.name: Crystal L Jonas
reviews.title: Fun for everyone
reviews.review: I'm so glad I bought this I have 3 children14 , 9 , & 5.2.girls & a boy. We all have so much fun playing the different games together.I also love the diversity of the controllers & game play. One of us can play on the TV or take it on the go , or all of us can play togetheron the big screen. It's so small & easy to set up I put all the stuff back in the box for safe keeping whenever we arnt playing it since it only takes 2 min to set it back up.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2020
reviews.name: Eduardo
reviews.title: So lucky!
reviews.review: So glad I got this when I did! Good price compared to the rest out right now. Perfect condition !

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2020
reviews.name: Eugene L.
reviews.title: Best Travel System
reviews.review: I love the system. Set up was very easy and self explanatory. Software updates and game downloads do take quite a bit time. However after that it is work very smoothly. I do recommend buy an additional micro-sd card because games fill the internal storage fast.I bought it to take with me on a trip instead of my ps3 or Wii and this was the best investment. I can play games while sitting on the plane or on TV using the docking station.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2020
reviews.name: Hector Matos
reviews.title: Game not included???? Didn't they get a smaller letter????
reviews.review: I am very upset with this situation. I have purchased special editions of any number of consoles. If you buy the special edition of Destiny on PlayStation, you have the game. If you buy the special edition of Halo on Xbox, you have the game. If you buy the Wii Special Edition of Super Mario Bros 25th Anniversary, rest assured, you have the game. The first thing I saw when I opened the box was the message from Nintendo, "GAME NOT INCLUDED". But you do the publication and place it in a VERY SMALL font size and in a recondite place. VERY BAD AMAZON, VERY BAD.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2021
reviews.name: Yi Wei
reviews.title: Patchwork of used machines, but works.
reviews.review: Functioning, but the code on the box doesn't match the code on the console, also the left and the right joy-cons code doesn't match. Obviously, this is a cobbled-together machine that differs from what I thought and makes me worry about it. However, since is functioning well so far and the console looks fine when I took it out, I can rate it for three-star.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2020
reviews.name: GijaneJA
reviews.title: luv
reviews.review: Love my system, glad I waited instead of buying at the higher prices. The only thing that would have made this better would have been it the game came with.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2021
reviews.name: Zack Riddle
reviews.title: Animal Crossing Fans Dream
reviews.review: I absolutely love this switch! I’ve been a huge fan of Animal Crossing since the days on GameCube. This is an absolute must for any real Animal Crossing fan. Completely blown away by how great the console looked when I opened it. 10/10 will always recommend!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2021
reviews.name: Wade
reviews.title: Game not included
reviews.review: I didn't read the fine print.I thought I could pay more for the "Animal Crossing" edition because the game would offset the price.I was wrong.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2022
reviews.name: CatBear
reviews.title: Love the ACNH
reviews.review: I got this as a birthday gift to myself because I wanted a Switch instead of the Lite. It was a great purchase as an upgrade and I love it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2021
reviews.name: Dawn mcgee
reviews.title: Brand new?
reviews.review: Just received today. Delivery was much faster than expected. I was under the assumption I was purchasing a brand new console but the product did not come on the original packaging. I’m disappointed because I got for my son for Christmas. I hope it works. If it’s not brand new than the price is way too much

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2022
reviews.name: Jon Carson
reviews.title: Animal Crossings Switch
reviews.review: I was happy to get this for my daughter. Same price as the original switch, but themed to match the Animal Crossings game.I was happy with it and she went crazy after getting this as a gift.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2020
reviews.name: Ruthie
reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.review: I love this console's colors so much. It's so pretty! The designs on the back are so nice.But it's not worth a scalper price. I was lucky and got it during Amazon's restock before New Horizons came out.It works like any other switch, but since this is a newer switch model, the battery life is noticeably longer than an older model switch.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2021
reviews.name: Scott J
reviews.title: Worth the Money
reviews.review: Nice to get at MSRP. It is the newer console with better battery life. This does interface with Animal Crossing and you get a nice Switch in your game. The console itself is innovative and the games are amazing. Great product at a non-gouged price.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2021
reviews.name: Andrew
reviews.title: Good switch
reviews.review: I got this when it was 298 USD and it's been the best investment I have ever done. I'm considering upgrading to the OLED switch but I'm skeptical they might make a Switch Pro. But yeah this switch is really good and has a nice design.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2020
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Don't blame price-gougers
reviews.review: Why would you leave a product a one-star review simply because THIRD-PARTY SELLERS are selling it for far more than it's worth? Amazon has no control over how much third-party sellers sell this item for. Knocking down this product's overall review for that reason is ridiculous.All complaints aside, I love this console. It doesn't have any problems with wandering joysticks or the screen being scratched by the dock like older versions of the switch. The animal crossing design and blue/green controllers look very nice. Overall, a worthy purchase.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2021
reviews.name: Stephanie O'Neill
reviews.title: Product Malfunctioned - Nintendo refuses to honor warranty
reviews.review: The joy-cons stopped syncing with the console, and Nintendo is refusing to fix it.We've been using it about a month and they are claiming we damaged it.Amazing that we can damage it in a way that it works perfectly EXCEPT for the controllers syncing.Nintendo is refusing to honor the warranty, and wants to charge us $100 to repair it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2021
reviews.name: Rebecca Jones
reviews.title: ACNH Nintendo Switch a MUST HAVE for any Fan or Player
reviews.review: I absolutely LOVE my Switch I'm able to play ACNH on my TV or Computer Monitor now or even kickstand the screen and play with my separate AC JoyCon Remote! For the price it's DEFINITELY worth it and since it's always going out of Stock quickly I'm truly lucky to have gotten it when I did.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2021
reviews.name: PopPunkPrincess
reviews.title: So fun and time consuming!
reviews.review: I have so much fun playing Pokemon snap on here! One thing is the controllers on either side sometimes don't connect when I'm playing so I have to turn it on and off again, but other than that, it's so fun! I'm just sad I waited so long to play it!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2021
reviews.name: Eddy
reviews.title: Amazing console
reviews.review: Amazing edition of the Nintendo Switch. I am glad this version was in stock compared to last year. Everything came as described, i only wish it came with a download code for the game. Recommend anyone who wants this edition to grab it now.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2021
reviews.name: pitcowher
reviews.title: It looks amazing
reviews.review: The switch animal crossing new horizons edition was brand spanking new and absolutely georgous. I had a blast for a couple days now playing the switch, i was mainly playing animal crossing new horizons and maro kart 8 dx.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2020
reviews.name: Nashma
reviews.title: A miraculous restock!!!!
reviews.review: I’m so glad I waited and didn’t give in to buying from a scalper. Now I finally have it for the REGUAR PRICE and it’s everything I dreamed of and more 💖

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2022
reviews.name: Asma'u Farinwata
reviews.title: Sister loves it!
reviews.review: very nice product, there was nothing wrong (so far). everything was wrapped and seemed to be in good condition, my sister loves it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2021
reviews.name: Athena McMillan
reviews.title: Item as described. Well packaged. Shipped responds well to communication
reviews.review: Shipping was slow, but seller had good communication, and made up for it with the little details. Item was exactly as described, and came very well packaged. I’ll def consider ordering from this seller again. Over all very pleasant experience.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2020
reviews.name: J.M.
reviews.title: As Expected - Normal Switch With Some Extra Flare
reviews.review: I'm satisfied with this, nothing crazy about it.Doesn't come with the game or anything like that, just some extra decorations.It costs the same as a normal switch retail so you can't be mad.If you're an animal crossing fan I would definitely purchase this, if you're not, just go for the normal one, as the special edition is selling over the price of a normal switch on the second hand market.Works great and as expected from a Nintendo product.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2022
reviews.name: Summer
reviews.title: So happy
reviews.review: I got my switch in December 2021 when it was sold out everywhere else. It's now May 2022 and it has been through heck...still works perfectly! Love my switch! And I love the colors so much!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2021
reviews.name: Brooksanna Kennedy
reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review: Got this early than expected which I was extremely happy about! I had the switch lite prior but love having the console so much more especially one with my favorite game on it!!! It’s easy to use and the colors are perfect

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2022
reviews.name: James E. Barbarics
reviews.title: Switch is awesome! Great looking version.
reviews.review: I’ve owned a Nintendo Switch before, and really enjoyed it. This one just looks better than the original. Works just as well. Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2020
reviews.name: Seo
reviews.title: let's just say..
reviews.review: This saved me from going crazy in quarantine.I bought this right before it all happened and this is all I do to keep my mentally okay.I virtually see my friends and change my island constantly with Animal Crossing.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2022
reviews.name: Kindle Customer
reviews.title: Highly disappointed
reviews.review: Bought this for my kids after Christmas and the l button doesn't work whatsoever. Impossible to play many games or even single player with the tv because I can't sync the controllers even.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020
reviews.name: AStevenson
reviews.title: Love this
reviews.review: This came quickly and in perfect condition. I was surprised since most of the stores had sold out at the time. My daughter loves this

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2020
reviews.name: Justine
reviews.title: Beautiful colors
reviews.review: Reviewing since I bought this and tons of people who didn't are giving it 1* because of scalpers. Reviews are for the product itself...The Switch is beautiful and detailed and I am so glad that I was able to get one.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2022
reviews.name: SoleWalker07311
reviews.title: My best first nintendo switch experience!
reviews.review: I never bought a console before, because I always been using PC gaming. so I decided to go for my fancy Nintendo Switch Console. I have zero regret buying it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2021
reviews.name: Carla
reviews.title: Christmas Gift
reviews.review: This is so very expensive for the Animal Crossing Switch and it doesn’t even come with the game. Would buy elsewhere if it wasn’t for the holiday crunch.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2022
reviews.name: Brandon Cook
reviews.title: Cute Switch, pity no copy of Animal Crossing Included
reviews.review: It's a cute designed switch and does just what it should. It's just a pity unlike other prior themed switches, it doesn't include the game promoted.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2021
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: was great!
reviews.review: this was great! and worth the price this was my first time getting one so i had to make a new account but everything was so easy with the help and the sighs on how to use it! They did ask me for a code before giving the items too me witch i thought was great! Came witch everything and over all was great definitely worth the price.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2022
reviews.name: Chazzy
reviews.title: Horrible.
reviews.review: I got this as a gift for my wife, and when I received the product. I noticed that the screen was broken An didn’t function properly at all. I am highly disappointed. Please do not purchase. I would attach photos but it will not let me attach any photos.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2021
reviews.name: Connie Callahan
reviews.title: Cute Switch but sell the game with it next time
reviews.review: Cute - Functional- and great gift for daughter - she loves itI was already aware that the game did not come with the Switch- and I bought it separately- but that is the only thing I wish Nintendo would go back to - if selling a themed game system - sell the game with it!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2020
reviews.name: Zanobia
reviews.title: Expensive, but cute! Don’t regret it one bit.
reviews.review: This is well worth it. We spent forever trying to find one, and even though the game (purchased separate) is not as interactive as one might hope, it is such a gorgeous console. My boyfriend and I love the look of it! The battery life is good, I haven’t had any issues with drifting. Good purchase!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2022
reviews.name: Dr
reviews.title: Ridiculous $64.78 restocking fee!!!
reviews.review: The item didn’t work as described so I returned it, they are charging $64.78 plus dollars as a restocking fee!!! Especially because it didn’t work!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2020
reviews.name: Termy
reviews.title: Mad but happy
reviews.review: I had to paid extra $40 to get this cause I thought Nintendo was making anymore but just my luck Walmart’s got a shipment of the limited edition yesterday o well it came two days before it should and came brand new didn’t get rip off

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2022
reviews.name: Stacy Collins
reviews.title: Horrible Suport
reviews.review: Got this 2 weeks ago. Right joy con has malfunctioned since the first push of A! I call they want me to send it to Nintendo and wait weeks for a possible “solution”. A simple exchange would be easy. Not an option! I’ve waited along time to get my hands on this for it not to function!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2020
reviews.name: Navi_DT
reviews.title: Very Pretty Console 🥺💗
reviews.review: This looks so cute and soft. I love it very much.Works fine. Currently waiting for the game so I cannot say much about battery life and performance of the console in general. But I guess it will be fine.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2022
reviews.name: Jules
reviews.title: Great
reviews.review: I love my new console

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2020
reviews.name: Alex Wu
reviews.title: Waited for this exact moment
reviews.review: I've been putting off buying a Nintendo switch for myself until they made an animal crossing game for it. It turns out that my patience has paid off! This is one of the most aesthetically pleasing special edition consoles in my opinion. The pastel colors on the side and the off white color of the base gives it a nice tropical and island vibe. The details on this are amazing as well! They even go as far as to make little islands on the back of the tablet iself. I am completely satisfied with this and more!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2021
reviews.name: Lancer
reviews.title: Great color. FYI no games included.
reviews.review: The color is good looking and I recommend this leather carry case to match. Extra purchase for the case. Anyone who does not know, it does not come with any games so you are just paying for the different look. Buy it when it’s on sale.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2020
reviews.name: RPGinger
reviews.title: Double check your product
reviews.review: Make sure you check this when it arrives. I ordered in October to guaranteei would have to give at Christmas. Everything looked to be in order when I peeked in box. My son opened on xmas morning only to discover the tablet was not in box.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2020
reviews.name: Pramey Das
reviews.title: cutest console ive ever received
reviews.review: this is the console version of driving a lamborghini, honestly gets so much attention due to its exclusivity. really cute pastel colors are very different to anything else we have seen in a switch console and it very pleasing to the eye. I wish it however was more accessible coz at this point i just regret opening this and using it since its so rare. Please restock in large amounts and I would truly give it 5 stars.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2021
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: This is a really stable walker, it will keep you safe.
reviews.review: gives really stable support and balance for walking after 2d -time hip replacement surgery.Also the seat is handy for carrying things, and of course for sitting when necessary. I took it walking in my neighborhood without leaning on it, just needed stabilizing while walking different terrains.It is a bit heavy to put in car, but it can be done and its convenience is worth it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2021
reviews.name: Tavon
reviews.title: Cool cool cool
reviews.review: I’ve wanted one forever and was finally able to afford one!! I’ve not had a video game system since Nintendo DS and when I had it played Animal Crossing quite frequently so I was excited to see a Animal Crossing special edition Switch AND that was cheaper than the standard model, however unfortunately there is no game or even accessories with the unit

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2020
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: No BS real switch.
reviews.review: Real switch, fast shipping, regular price but amazon is the only place for months who’s had them in stock. Plus it’s the special edition for the regular price. Just as pictured

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2021
reviews.name: michael
reviews.title: Blank screen
reviews.review: Came in the mail in an open box and switch wouldn’tturn on. Docking station is also not working. I tried my neighbor’s system to help troubleshoot but nothing on the Switch I ordered worked or would connect to theirs. Would not recommend.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2021
reviews.name: logan
reviews.title: Great switch and color scheme
reviews.review: Amazing! I love this switch and the game it’s meant for. Hella chill having this with me I love it. I get a lot of compliments and have people ask “Whered you get that?!” 😂😂 it’s awesome

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2021
reviews.name: Brandon Smith
reviews.title: Love the colors
reviews.review: The colors of the joy cons and overall decoration were very cool. I liked that the docking station had the Animal Crossing theme too. Not much difference in functioning versus the most current switch, but the colors and detail were awesome. Only real downside was the game doesn’t come with it, which in my case didn’t matter since I already had the game. Those who may think this is a special edition switch with the game just need to realize this is the console and docking station, game has to be bought separately.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2021
reviews.name: 💙💙💙💙
reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review: Beautiful! I love EVERYTHING about it. The colors the portability (this is my first switch) the picture is AMAZING! The sound quality. Over all I feel like I got my money's worth for 350 dollars.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2020
reviews.name: Mango
reviews.title: Finally bought a Switch
reviews.review: I’ve been waiting for years for a limited edition Switch that I would like. I was so excited when I saw pictures of this one and for one my favorite games as well. I couldn’t believe how quickly the preorders sold out. Luckily I was able to purchase this at MSRP when it was restocked. Now I play it every day! I love the pastel colors and the patterned back.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2022
reviews.name: Philip Martinez
reviews.title: Great Product and Fast Delivery
reviews.review: I loved that it was still in stock and the price was great. The time I ordered it to the time it was delivered was the best I have ever seen Amazon deliver.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2021
reviews.name: Sirree Levario
reviews.title: Animal Crossing!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2020
reviews.name: PamelaJ
reviews.title: Cute console
reviews.review: It's a very pretty console. The unique dock color is very nice.Came undamaged and in perfect condition.Also arrived within 5 days, when Amazon estimated it'd be 2 months.(Don't buy if it's over 299. It's cool and unique but not really worth more than its msrp.)

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2020
reviews.name: Stephany C
reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
reviews.review: I’m so glad I splurged and got this for myself, came in great condition and have had no issues! I’ve been playing animal crossing non stop on it. I customized mine with stickers but the coloring is so beautiful you can keep it as is!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2021
reviews.name: J Downing
reviews.title: Just buy it for her you won't regret it!
reviews.review: Bought this for my wife for mother's day she loves it! She hasn't stopped playing animal crossing since she got to unbox except to thank me. She was verry greatful 😉😁. Worth the money!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2021
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: This did not meet expectation
reviews.review: I read in some previous reviews that there was a problem with the battery.The review said that was with the old models.They must have shipped me a old model because the battery does not last more than an hour before it needs charging.Someone sold me junk.An old model.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2021
reviews.name: Tashara
reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review: The best purchase I made on Amazon... I wasn’t sure about buying at first because of it being on Amazon so when I ordered it, I prayed it would go good. I was so excited when I actually got it. I had no idea it was considered a “limited edition” nice touch. If you can’t find anywhere else, I highly recommend getting it from here.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2020
reviews.name: nopsis
reviews.title: Cute, but has the same joycon drift issues as the original
reviews.review: After a few months, I'm noticing joycon drift already. I use it mostly in handheld mode. Battery is superior to the original, but the joycons still suck.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2021
reviews.name: leonet33
reviews.title: Best thing I ever got

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2020
reviews.name: D.
reviews.title: DONT BUY FROM SCALPERS!! TARGET *MAY* RESTOCK!!!
reviews.review: Let me start by saying that I am so glad I got this switch. I didn’t buy it from a scalper or even from Amazon— on launch day, Target had a few units available and pure determination had me up at 1am to order for pick-up in store and in Time Square at store opening to ensure I got my unit.Unfortunately, as is true with many Nintendo special/limited editions, a bunch of absolutely horrible, awful people have bought out these units with the intention of selling them at an inflated rate to make a profit. And sadly they succeed in their slimy business venture because of the high desirability of these items. Let me give you two reasons why you should definitely not purchase it, even as a massive Animal Crossing fan.1. TARGET MAY RESTOCK. One of my friends missed out on the Target launch day availability and she contacted the stores. They told her that they intend to restock, they just aren’t aware of when. One store said that Friday, 3/20 is a likely date, but this is for a NY store so it may not be universal. Also, take into account that there are massive business slow-downs in the midst of the COVID-19 pandemic. That being said, Target should still have some soon. So if you can hold out, definitely do it.2. As gorgeous as this switch is, and as much as I walked 30 blocks at 6 AM in driving rain in order to get mine, it’s not worth the inflated price at all. I can absolutely see myself forgetting there is anything unique about the console in a few months. In reality, the joycons are the most memorable part of the system as it is the part I see most often, while the console itself is just a pleasant little detail.It is lovely, but not worth 100+ more than original asking price. This is coming from an absolute Animal Crossing Superfan.Guys, purchasing from scalpers only encourages their behaviors and ensures a profit. If they are unable to move stock, they’ll have to lower the prices to rid of the units. The fact that Target is going to restock in the first place already puts their investment on shaky ground. Additionally, sites like Amazon are supposed to have policies to protect against scalpers and exploiters (read their recent COVID-19 documents where they clearly condemn and address these actions) so if you’re willing to take the time to report these scalpers, then Amazon may push them off. It’ll be one less site they can operate on and hopefully start to delegitimize their practices.I know it’s hard, AC Buddies, but don’t give in to these jerks. Keep your eyes open for other venues that may sell, look out for those restocks, consider purchasing the dock or joycons only from Japan, and don’t give in to scalpers!!!*EDIT 3/23/20* I'm making a small edit/note to this post as someone did comment on my review with their experience. Please, note that I did say that the information may not be universal because the information that I got was from a NY store, and that COVID-19 may change Target's plans/ability to restock on the console. I am only relaying information that was given to me. Thanks and good luck!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2020
reviews.name: Lavender
reviews.title: TIPS for anyone who still want this!!
reviews.review: UPDATE 8/27/20: warning for anyone buying this on 3rd party websites like Etsy or ebay for prices like 299 or lower, beware of scammers. Unfortunately, I was scammed recently so if a deal looks like its too good to be true, it probably is.Original post:I know a lot of people didn't get a chance to grab this special edition when it was first released, and although it was released again shortly, it was sold out in minutes. The most recent restock/release was in July 2020 in Australia, but people also reported that it was hard to find a store that carried it before being all sold out. So how are you going to get your hands on this without paying for the 3rd party price tag that is double or even triple the original $299.99?1) You can actually buy the exact sky blue/mint green colored joy-con hard replacement cases from a lot of sellers on Amazon for roughly $20.2) You can buy the exact animal crossing special edition black hard plate from a lot of sellers on ebay for roughly $20, and you can install it on yourself.3) If you don't want to DIY yourself, and would rather get the actual legit Nintendo product, do not fret! People have reportedly contacted Nintendo stores, and the staff said this is not a limited edition, so it will be restocked every now and then in the future! It is released in small quantities at a time due to the manufacturing issues.You will all have to be very patient.For those of people who already have a switch, and just like the aesthetic of the animal crossing edition, just buy the replacement parts separately and DIY yourself. Why spend $500+ for a switch you already have and reward a 3rd party seller for taking advantage of you? Instead spend no more than $50, and just DIY the case yourself!

("Nintendo") warrants to the original purchaser that the hardware product shall be free from defects in material and workmanship for twelve (12) months from the date of purchase. If a defect covered by this warranty occurs during this warranty period, Nintendo will repair or replace the defective hardware product or component, free of charge.* The original purchaser is entitled to this warranty only if the date of purchase is registered at point of sale or the consumer can demonstrate, to Nintendo's satisfaction, that the product was purchased within the last 12 months.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2021
reviews.name: sweetchicgrl411
reviews.title: Favorite Nintendo Console!
reviews.review: So I didn't purchase the Animal Crossing console on Amazon — But I did buy it at my local Meijers store on sale during the holiday season. I have the Nintendo Lite (in yellow) and I decided to purchase the Animal Crossing console mainly because I wanted a better screen, and be able to change out the controllers in case one goes bad. I also wanted the ability to play games on my TV. I like how the dock is minimalistic enough to not take up a lot of space on my TV stand — It's also a quick and easy set up! Also love that I can charge my switch on the dock without having to take out the power cable and plugging it somewhere.The controller colors are so pretty! I love pastel colors and I wish Nintendo made more pastel colored controllers. I like their colored controllers that they have out now in the store, but I just really like the pastel colors more, which was one of the reasons why I picked the ACNH console. I also love the subtle embossing of the Animal crossing characters and seasons on the back of the console. I think that's a cute touch! The dock itself is also super cute. I love Tom, Timmy, and Tommy in Animal crossing (probably one of my favorite characters) so I was excited to see them on the Dock! I've been a LOT of animal crossing so the theme of the switch is perfect! I just enjoy the aesthetic of this console a lot that it's become my favorite switch to play on. I was just glad that I was able to snag one since a lot of Nintendo Switch consoles are almost impossible to find in stores and online. Highly recommend if you have the budget for a regular console! Have had no issues so far.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2020
reviews.name: Twix
reviews.title: I Just Couldn't Pass This One Up
reviews.review: I'm a huge Animal Crossing fan. I also never had a Switch before, nor was I going to get one, because it just didn't appeal to me. I also never had a special edition console before either. I was going to skip this console even though a brand new Animal Crossing game was announced, but when they announced this Switch. I just couldn't pass this one up. The Animal Crossing game itself wasn't something that appeal to me either. It looks like it plays too much like Pocket Camp. It doesn't seem like it plays like your traditional Animal Crossing game, so I was going to just pass up on it. Now that I own the Switch. Hopefully I can get some more games for it besides Animal Crossing. That way It won't feel like a complete waste of money on purchasing it.Anyway, the system is adorable and I'm happy that I have it. I waited a day too late to pre-order it, so on release date. I had to get up early to hit my local Target. I went to my local Wal-Mart, but they was clueless as to what I was talking about. Even though I called two days earlier and they said they know of three they had in stock. My local GameStop said they'll have extras too, but that store is the store I go to as my last resort. I'm not a fan of GameStop (even though I pre-ordered New Horizons there.)My Wal-Mart is extremely ghetto. No good Customer service at all and workers got terrible attitudes and are impatient with their customers. I went home after being at Wal-Mart for a little over an hour waiting for them to open up their electronics section and my phone had died. When I got home, I called them to see if the electronics were open. Still no answer, so I gave up on Wal-Mart. I decided to call my local Target after I looked up what time they open. I called the first time which was no answer, so I waited a few minutes and called again. They finally picked up and told me they had quite a few systems after I asked them. When I went to my Target. It was only two people back in the electronics section and they were not looking for a Special Edition Animal Crossing Switch. I was the only one looking for it. I got my copy and headed home finally able to rest since I didn't sleep all night that previous night. I wouldn't be surprised if my local Target still have some in stock.Anyhow, Obviously the game doesn't come with the system. If it did, the system would be priced higher. Also people (like me for instance) don't want a digital copy of the game. I prefer a physical copy. Digital games depresses me, so it only make since for Nintendo to not bundle the game with the system. Let the people decide if they want a digitally, or a actual physical copy. It's been said by Nintendo as well as countless others that the game will not be included. You have to be living under a rock in order to miss that info. The system released Friday March 13, 2020. The game doesn't come out until tomorrow, which is Friday March 20, 2020. So I don't know why people thought the game was going to come bundled with the system and they both released at different times.The system is very pretty. I haven't used the dock yet though until I get a screen protector. I heard though that the Switch fits a bit more loosely in the dock to prevent the screen from getting scratched, which is awesome, but I still don't want to dock the Switch yet until I get a screen protector. I also will most likely be playing my Switch in handheld mode, so I will be getting a case for it. I saw a hard shell Animal Crossing case. It looks much sturdier and cuter than the one everyone got on the Switch's release. This Switch is just a thing of beauty, but now I'm broke lol.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2021
reviews.name: Ace Prestige
reviews.title: It's a special edition Switch!
reviews.review: What's NOT to love about the Switch? It has proven itself to be a solid gaming console. While CERTAINLY not as powerful as the PS5and Xbox Series X (It is not even as powerful as the PS4 Pro and Xbox One X),it holds its own in many aspects. It has a large library of 1st party hits and the 3rd party support is strong as well. Whether in docked mode for TVs or in handheld/tabletop mode for portable play.... Switch has you covered. The ONLY issue with this version of the Switch design that I have, is the flimsy kickstand in the back for tabletop play. You are MUCH better off buying a third party stand for this purpose. This is an issue that the upcoming (at the time of this review being written) OLED Switch will seemingly rectify. NOW all that aside, if you are a video game collector, I would STRONGLY suggest that you do not delay and pick this up NOW, while it is still at the normal retail price. Because once they run out of stock/Nintendo discontinues it...... the price will start to rise with 3rd party resellers/scalpers. I Believe that you will NOT be disappointed.

reviews.title: Thank You Amazon
reviews.review: This special edition of Nintendo Switch has been sold out everywhere. You would never know how happy I was when I see it available on Amazon! Initially, I thought it's a system mistake to let me place my order successfully until the time I saw the Switch shipped to my door only a couple of days later! Thank you, Amazon! This version of the Nintendo Switch is super cute so that I bought it even I have one before. I like it so much! Thank you, Amazon!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2020
reviews.name: Ella
reviews.title: BUY!
