reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2020
reviews.name: Adolfo Osegueda
reviews.title: Don't let scalpers win!
reviews.review: Finally after waiting I managed to snag a switch for the normal price of $300. Anything more than that is insane. I've seen switches on here go for $400 and up. DO NOT let scalpers steal money from you when you can use the extra money to buy a game or two.Now moving on to the switch itself. It is so much fun! I got Mario 3d all stars as my first game/games for mine I've been enjoying it so much. I heard from my friends who are also switch owners that joycon drift is a thing I will inevitably have to deal with since the controller has a defect of some kind which causes the joysticks to eventually drift and ruin gameplay. So a Pro controller is something that you may consider investing in which is what I plan to do as well. For that reason I have to remove a star off my rating. Other than that the console is really awesome and I truly recommend owning it but not for what the scalpers are asking for them. I recommend waiting like I did until more are in stock for the normal price of $300.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2022
reviews.name: Lessien
reviews.title: The actual product
reviews.review: I was concerned that I was going to get something refurbished (or worse) when I bought this switch. I’ve been waiting since it first came out (and was immediately sold out to those unmentionable vultures) and now my patience has been rewarded.One brand new, plastic wrapped, fully register-able, fingerprint-less special edition game system for me ^_^I took pictures (and a video) just in case something was missing, but nothing was. It came with everything it was supposed to. I can’t wait to set it up and get my data off my SO’s switch. Which I’m gonna do in like 10 seconds. Enjoy the review (and maybe hit “buy now” while I go do Nintendo stuff.Ta-ta for now ^_^PS, I’ll update after I’ve played with for a few weeks it so I can give a more accurate/less emotional review.Ta-ta. For real this time.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2020

reviews.title: Cute, but...
reviews.review: The Joycons are painted. Nintendo officially stated not to clean them with alcohol, and I've heard of the paint rubbing off for some users. It's pretty ridiculous that they're so fragile.The rest of the console looks great though! The dock itself is beautiful; It is molded in that wonderful cream colored plastic, and so are the Joycon straps! It's just such a shame that they cheaped out with the Joycons.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2020
reviews.name: Hannah Patiño
reviews.title: Beautiful but overpriced
reviews.review: I love this switch really it’s beautiful and I’m more than excited to play on it and play during this quarantine. The only thing I don’t like is that it’s overpriced. I shouldn’t have had to pay double or more for this switch but I did. And luckily I had enough but others may not and it makes me feel bad. It would’ve been nice to pay the original price or at least make it more of an affordable price. Or not just bought it and sell it for more and let others have the actual chance of getting one in stores or online when it came out. If you have the money for this and if you’re a big fan of animal crossing I would say that this is something to do but I wish this was for affordable for others who may be fans of animal crossing as well and don’t have this much money to spare.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2022

There isn't much difference with the layout, or playing the games, but there are some nice playing features on Mario mainly choosing the character I play with. Other than that I love that the switch is smaller and doesn't take up that much space, it charges super fast, don't need the disc - those should've went out years ago, I have the yearly switch online membership to player older games which is cool not having to purchase each one. I've had my console about 1 month no complaints, and I love the colors of the animal crossing console. Happy customer !!!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2021
reviews.name: Ethan Bartiromo
reviews.title: Fun for all ages!!!
reviews.review: I bought this for myself to start streaming on twitch!I love doing that so much and I have met lots of cool people doing so!I play this all the time, mostly Pokémon games, but I am willing to start playing others as soon as I finish the games I started!I was able to complete the Pokédex for let’s go Pikachu, and I have almost completed the game for Sword, I plan to start playing Brilliant Diamond soon!This system does not come with any games, which I knew, but some people may not because it is animal crossing themed.I originally purchased the exact same system from GameStop for the same price, but the insurance plan on it was much worse!GameStop charged me $50 for a 1 year insurance plan, where Amazon charged me $30 for a 3 year plan!I totally recommend this system for whatever Nintendo games you plan to play!One thing to know for new gamers is that you cannot play most “popular” games like what is on XBox and PlayStation, but you get games with more substance and fun value on this system than on those!I am a die hard Nintendo gamer and I always have been, but I did not have this system until way after it came out!I regret not buying it sooner!It is a great time to be had by all!100% recommend the purchase!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2021
reviews.name: ThumpersMilk
reviews.title: Absolute Trash!
reviews.review: CONS!1. They say you get a FREE 7 DAY TRIAL MEMBERSHIP. This is a complete scam. When you try to sign up it asks you to pick a membership which you assume starts AFTER the free trial! Nope you get charged instantly, and you get no trial! Classic bait and switch.2. Joy Con Drift! After a few months your controllers will drift all over on their own. Class action lawsuit already underway for this.3. SLOW! It took 45 minutes to download Rocket League on this thing. I have a super fast connection and would take only a couple minutes on a laptop.4. Bad Controls! I played Mario 35 (which I can only play for 2 days before they delete it off my device! WTF!) And having played thousands of hours on Mario on previous gen consoles this one has the button locations set in very weird spots. (I can probably remap the buttons, but why are they so unconventional for the defaults.5. It's EXPENSIVE! Nintendo has for years created artificial shortages of their products to create hype which then creates strong sales for them, so they constantly do this in waves which means when in stock the "flippers" stock up on them and gouge you on prices when Nintendo does their fake shortage thing.6. It's OLD! This console had specs when new 5 or 6 years ago. The graphics are horrible when compared to the new Playstation and Xbox.7. Nintendo hates it's customers. Nintendo has sued people for streaming and posting video gameplay. And for years charged YouTubers to show their content. Talk about greed!PROS1. Good resale value
